   23: -module(ssh_options_SUITE).
   24: 
   25: %%% This test suite tests different options for the ssh functions
   26: 
   27: 
   28: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   29: -include_lib("kernel/include/file.hrl").
   30: -include("ssh_test_lib.hrl").
   31: 
   32: %%% Test cases
   33: -export([
   34:          auth_method_kb_interactive_data_tuple/1,
   35:          auth_method_kb_interactive_data_fun3/1,
   36:          auth_method_kb_interactive_data_fun4/1,
   37:          auth_none/1,
   38:          connectfun_disconnectfun_client/1, 
   39: 	 disconnectfun_option_client/1, 
   40: 	 disconnectfun_option_server/1, 
   41: 	 id_string_no_opt_client/1, 
   42: 	 id_string_no_opt_server/1, 
   43: 	 id_string_own_string_client/1, 
   44: 	 id_string_own_string_client_trail_space/1, 
   45: 	 id_string_own_string_server/1, 
   46: 	 id_string_own_string_server_trail_space/1, 
   47: 	 id_string_random_client/1, 
   48: 	 id_string_random_server/1, 
   49:          max_log_item_len/1,
   50: 	 max_sessions_sftp_start_channel_parallel/1, 
   51: 	 max_sessions_sftp_start_channel_sequential/1, 
   52: 	 max_sessions_ssh_connect_parallel/1, 
   53: 	 max_sessions_ssh_connect_sequential/1, 
   54:          max_sessions_drops_tcp_connects/1,
   55:          max_sessions_drops_tcp_connects/0,
   56: 	 server_password_option/1, 
   57: 	 server_userpassword_option/1, 
   58: 	 server_pwdfun_option/1,
   59: 	 server_pwdfun_4_option/1,
   60: 	 server_keyboard_interactive/1,
   61: 	 server_keyboard_interactive_extra_msg/1,
   62: 	 ssh_connect_arg4_timeout/1, 
   63: 	 ssh_connect_negtimeout_parallel/1, 
   64: 	 ssh_connect_negtimeout_sequential/1, 
   65: 	 ssh_connect_nonegtimeout_connected_parallel/1,
   66: 	 ssh_connect_nonegtimeout_connected_sequential/1,
   67: 	 ssh_connect_timeout/1, connect/4,
   68: 	 ssh_daemon_minimal_remote_max_packet_size_option/1, 
   69: 	 ssh_msg_debug_fun_option_client/1, 
   70: 	 ssh_msg_debug_fun_option_server/1, 
   71: 	 system_dir_option/1, 
   72: 	 unexpectedfun_option_client/1, 
   73: 	 unexpectedfun_option_server/1, 
   74: 	 user_dir_option/1,
   75: 	 user_dir_fun_option/1,
   76: 	 connectfun_disconnectfun_server/1,
   77: 	 connectfun4_server/1,
   78: 	 disconnectfun2_client/1,
   79: 	 disconnectfun2_server/1,
   80: 	 hostkey_fingerprint_check/1,
   81: 	 hostkey_fingerprint_check_md5/1,
   82: 	 hostkey_fingerprint_check_sha/1,
   83: 	 hostkey_fingerprint_check_sha256/1,
   84: 	 hostkey_fingerprint_check_sha384/1,
   85: 	 hostkey_fingerprint_check_sha512/1,
   86: 	 hostkey_fingerprint_check_list/1,
   87:          save_accepted_host_option/1,
   88:          raw_option/1,
   89:          config_file/1,
   90:          config_file_modify_algorithms_order/1,
   91:          daemon_replace_options_simple/1,
   92:          daemon_replace_options_algs/1,
   93:          daemon_replace_options_algs_connect/1,
   94:          daemon_replace_options_algs_conf_file/1
   95: 	]).
   96: 
   97: %%% Common test callbacks
   98: -export([suite/0, all/0, groups/0, 
   99: 	 init_per_suite/1, end_per_suite/1, 
  100: 	 init_per_group/2, end_per_group/2, 
  101: 	 init_per_testcase/2, end_per_testcase/2
  102: 	]).
  103: 
  104: %%% For test nodes
  105: -export([get_preferred_algorithms/2
  106:         ]).
  107: 
  108: -define(NEWLINE, <<"\r\n">>).
  109: 
  110: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  111: %% Common Test interface functions -----------------------------------
  112: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  113: 
  114: suite() ->
  115:     [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]},
  116:      {timetrap,{seconds,15}}].
  117: 
  118: all() -> 
  119:     [connectfun_disconnectfun_server,
  120:      connectfun4_server,
  121:      disconnectfun2_client,
  122:      disconnectfun2_server,
  123:      connectfun_disconnectfun_client,
  124:      server_password_option,
  125:      server_userpassword_option,
  126:      server_pwdfun_option,
  127:      server_pwdfun_4_option,
  128:      server_keyboard_interactive,
  129:      server_keyboard_interactive_extra_msg,
  130:      auth_method_kb_interactive_data_tuple,
  131:      auth_method_kb_interactive_data_fun3,
  132:      auth_method_kb_interactive_data_fun4,
  133:      auth_none,
  134:      {group, dir_options},
  135:      ssh_connect_timeout,
  136:      ssh_connect_arg4_timeout,
  137:      ssh_daemon_minimal_remote_max_packet_size_option,
  138:      ssh_msg_debug_fun_option_client,
  139:      ssh_msg_debug_fun_option_server,
  140:      disconnectfun_option_server,
  141:      disconnectfun_option_client,
  142:      unexpectedfun_option_server,
  143:      unexpectedfun_option_client,
  144:      hostkey_fingerprint_check,
  145:      hostkey_fingerprint_check_md5,
  146:      hostkey_fingerprint_check_sha,
  147:      hostkey_fingerprint_check_sha256,
  148:      hostkey_fingerprint_check_sha384,
  149:      hostkey_fingerprint_check_sha512,
  150:      hostkey_fingerprint_check_list,
  151:      id_string_no_opt_client,
  152:      id_string_own_string_client,
  153:      id_string_own_string_client_trail_space,
  154:      id_string_random_client,
  155:      id_string_no_opt_server,
  156:      id_string_own_string_server,
  157:      id_string_own_string_server_trail_space,
  158:      id_string_random_server,
  159:      max_log_item_len,
  160:      save_accepted_host_option,
  161:      raw_option,
  162:      config_file,
  163:      config_file_modify_algorithms_order,
  164:      daemon_replace_options_simple,
  165:      daemon_replace_options_algs,
  166:      daemon_replace_options_algs_connect,
  167:      daemon_replace_options_algs_conf_file,
  168:      {group, hardening_tests}
  169:     ].
  170: 
  171: groups() ->
  172:     [{hardening_tests, [], [ssh_connect_nonegtimeout_connected_parallel,
  173: 			    ssh_connect_nonegtimeout_connected_sequential,
  174: 			    ssh_connect_negtimeout_parallel,
  175: 			    ssh_connect_negtimeout_sequential,
  176: 			    max_sessions_ssh_connect_parallel,
  177: 			    max_sessions_ssh_connect_sequential,
  178: 			    max_sessions_sftp_start_channel_parallel,
  179: 			    max_sessions_sftp_start_channel_sequential,
  180:                             max_sessions_drops_tcp_connects
  181: 			   ]},
  182:      {dir_options, [], [user_dir_option,
  183:                         user_dir_fun_option,
  184: 			system_dir_option]}
  185:     ].
  186: 
  187: 
  188: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  189: init_per_suite(Config) ->
  190:     ?CHECK_CRYPTO(Config).
  191: 
  192: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
  193:     ssh:stop().
  194: 
  195: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  196: init_per_group(hardening_tests, Config) ->
  197:     ct:log("Pub keys setup for: ~p",
  198:            [ssh_test_lib:setup_all_user_host_keys(Config)]),
  199:     Config;
  200: init_per_group(dir_options, Config) ->
  201:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  202:     %% Make unreadable dir:
  203:     Dir_unreadable = filename:join(PrivDir, "unread"),
  204:     ok = file:make_dir(Dir_unreadable),
  205:     {ok,F1} = file:read_file_info(Dir_unreadable),
  206:     ok = file:write_file_info(Dir_unreadable, 
  207: 			      F1#file_info{mode = F1#file_info.mode band (bnot 8#00444)}),
  208:     %% Make readable file:
  209:     File_readable = filename:join(PrivDir, "file"),
  210:     ok = file:write_file(File_readable, <<>>),
  211: 
  212:     %% Check:
  213:     case {file:read_file_info(Dir_unreadable), 
  214: 	  file:read_file_info(File_readable)} of
  215: 	{{ok, Id=#file_info{type=directory, access=Md}},
  216: 	 {ok, If=#file_info{type=regular,   access=Mf}}} ->
  217: 	    AccessOK =
  218: 		case {Md,                Mf} of
  219: 		    {read,               _} -> false;
  220: 		    {read_write,         _} -> false;
  221: 		    {_,               read} -> true;
  222: 		    {_,         read_write} -> true;
  223: 		    _ -> false
  224: 		end,
  225: 
  226: 	    case AccessOK of
  227: 		true ->
  228: 		    %% Save:
  229: 		    [{unreadable_dir, Dir_unreadable},
  230: 		     {readable_file, File_readable} 
  231: 		     | Config];
  232: 		false ->
  233: 		    ct:log("File#file_info : ~p~n"
  234: 			   "Dir#file_info  : ~p",[If,Id]),
  235: 		    {skip, "File or dir mode settings failed"}
  236: 	    end;
  237: 
  238: 	NotDirFile ->
  239: 	    ct:log("{Dir,File} -> ~p",[NotDirFile]),
  240: 	    {skip, "File/Dir creation failed"}
  241:     end;
  242: init_per_group(_, Config) ->
  243:     Config.
  244: 
  245: end_per_group(_, Config) ->
  246:     Config.
  247: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  248: init_per_testcase(_TestCase, Config) ->
  249:     ssh:start(),
  250:     %% Create a clean user_dir
  251:     UserDir = filename:join(proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config), nopubkey),
  252:     ssh_test_lib:del_dirs(UserDir),
  253:     file:make_dir(UserDir),
  254:     [{user_dir,UserDir}|Config].
  255: 
  256: end_per_testcase(_TestCase, _Config) ->
  257:     ssh:stop(),
  258:     ok.
  259: 
  260: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  261: %% Test Cases --------------------------------------------------------
  262: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  263: 
  264: %%% validate to server that uses the 'password' option
  265: server_password_option(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  266:     UserDir = proplists:get_value(user_dir, Config),
  267:     SysDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  268:     {Pid, Host, Port} = ssh_test_lib:daemon([{system_dir, SysDir},
  269: 					     {user_dir, UserDir},
  270: 					     {password, "morot"}]),
  271: 
  272:     ConnectionRef =
  273: 	ssh_test_lib:connect(Host, Port, [{silently_accept_hosts, true},
  274: 					  {user, "foo"},
  275: 					  {password, "morot"},
  276: 					  {user_interaction, false},
  277: 					  {user_dir, UserDir}]),
  278: 
  279:     Reason = "Unable to connect using the available authentication methods",
  280:     
  281:     {error, Reason} =
  282: 	ssh:connect(Host, Port, [{silently_accept_hosts, true},
  283:                                  {save_accepted_host, false},
  284: 				 {user, "vego"},
  285: 				 {password, "foo"},
  286: 				 {user_interaction, false},
  287: 				 {user_dir, UserDir}]),
  288:     
  289:     ct:log("Test of wrong password: Error msg: ~p ~n", [Reason]),
  290: 
  291:     ssh:close(ConnectionRef),
  292:     ssh:stop_daemon(Pid).
  293: 
  294: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  295: 
  296: %%% validate to server that uses the 'password' option
  297: server_userpassword_option(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  298:     UserDir = proplists:get_value(user_dir, Config),
  299:     SysDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),	  
  300:     {Pid, Host, Port} = ssh_test_lib:daemon([{system_dir, SysDir},
  301: 					     {user_dir, UserDir},
  302: 					     {user_passwords, [{"vego", "morot"}]}]),
  303: 
  304:     ConnectionRef =
  305: 	ssh_test_lib:connect(Host, Port, [{silently_accept_hosts, true},
  306: 					  {user, "vego"},
  307: 					  {password, "morot"},
  308: 					  {user_interaction, false},
  309: 					  {user_dir, UserDir}]),
  310:     ssh:close(ConnectionRef),
  311: 
  312:     Reason = "Unable to connect using the available authentication methods",
  313: 
  314:     {error, Reason} =
  315: 	ssh:connect(Host, Port, [{silently_accept_hosts, true},
  316:                                  {save_accepted_host, false},
  317: 				 {user, "foo"},
  318: 				 {password, "morot"},
  319: 				 {user_interaction, false},
  320: 				 {user_dir, UserDir}]),
  321:     {error, Reason} =
  322: 	ssh:connect(Host, Port, [{silently_accept_hosts, true},
  323:                                  {save_accepted_host, false},
  324: 				 {user, "vego"},
  325: 				 {password, "foo"},
  326: 				 {user_interaction, false},
  327: 				 {user_dir, UserDir}]),
  328:     ssh:stop_daemon(Pid).
  329: 
  330: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  331: %%% validate to server that uses the 'pwdfun' option
  332: server_pwdfun_option(Config) ->
  333:     UserDir = proplists:get_value(user_dir, Config),
  334:     SysDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),	  
  335:     CHKPWD = fun("foo",Pwd) -> Pwd=="bar";
  336: 		(_,_) -> false
  337: 	     end,
  338:     {Pid, Host, Port} = ssh_test_lib:daemon([{system_dir, SysDir},
  339: 					     {user_dir, UserDir},
  340: 					     {pwdfun,CHKPWD}]),
  341:     ConnectionRef =
  342: 	ssh_test_lib:connect(Host, Port, [{silently_accept_hosts, true},
  343: 					  {user, "foo"},
  344: 					  {password, "bar"},
  345: 					  {user_interaction, false},
  346: 					  {user_dir, UserDir}]),
  347:     ssh:close(ConnectionRef),
  348: 
  349:     Reason = "Unable to connect using the available authentication methods",
  350:     
  351:     {error, Reason} =
  352: 	ssh:connect(Host, Port, [{silently_accept_hosts, true},
  353:                                  {save_accepted_host, false},
  354: 				 {user, "foo"},
  355: 				 {password, "morot"},
  356: 				 {user_interaction, false},
  357: 				 {user_dir, UserDir}]),
  358:     {error, Reason} =
  359: 	ssh:connect(Host, Port, [{silently_accept_hosts, true},
  360:                                  {save_accepted_host, false},
  361: 				 {user, "vego"},
  362: 				 {password, "foo"},
  363: 				 {user_interaction, false},
  364: 				 {user_dir, UserDir}]),
  365:     ssh:stop_daemon(Pid).
  366: 
  367:     
  368: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  369: %%% validate to server that uses the 'pwdfun/4' option
  370: server_pwdfun_4_option(Config) ->
  371:     UserDir = proplists:get_value(user_dir, Config),
  372:     SysDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),	  
  373:     PWDFUN = fun("foo",Pwd,{_,_},undefined) -> Pwd=="bar";
  374: 		("fie",Pwd,{_,_},undefined) -> {Pwd=="bar",new_state};
  375: 		("bandit",_,_,_) -> disconnect;
  376: 		(_,_,_,_) -> false
  377: 	     end,
  378:     {Pid, Host, Port} = ssh_test_lib:daemon([{system_dir, SysDir},
  379: 					     {user_dir, UserDir},
  380: 					     {pwdfun,PWDFUN}]),
  381:     ConnectionRef1 =
  382: 	ssh_test_lib:connect(Host, Port, [{silently_accept_hosts, true},
  383: 					  {user, "foo"},
  384: 					  {password, "bar"},
  385: 					  {user_interaction, false},
  386: 					  {user_dir, UserDir}]),
  387:     ssh:close(ConnectionRef1),
  388: 
  389:     ConnectionRef2 =
  390: 	ssh_test_lib:connect(Host, Port, [{silently_accept_hosts, true},
  391: 					  {user, "fie"},
  392: 					  {password, "bar"},
  393: 					  {user_interaction, false},
  394: 					  {user_dir, UserDir}]),
  395:     ssh:close(ConnectionRef2),
  396: 
  397:     Reason = "Unable to connect using the available authentication methods",
  398:     
  399:     {error, Reason} =
  400: 	ssh:connect(Host, Port, [{silently_accept_hosts, true},
  401:                                  {save_accepted_host, false},
  402: 				 {user, "foo"},
  403: 				 {password, "morot"},
  404: 				 {user_interaction, false},
  405: 				 {user_dir, UserDir}]),
  406:     {error, Reason} =
  407: 	ssh:connect(Host, Port, [{silently_accept_hosts, true},
  408:                                  {save_accepted_host, false},
  409: 				 {user, "fie"},
  410: 				 {password, "morot"},
  411: 				 {user_interaction, false},
  412: 				 {user_dir, UserDir}]),
  413:     {error, Reason} =
  414: 	ssh:connect(Host, Port, [{silently_accept_hosts, true},
  415: 				 {user, "vego"},
  416: 				 {password, "foo"},
  417: 				 {user_interaction, false},
  418: 				 {user_dir, UserDir}]),
  419: 
  420:     {error, Reason} =
  421: 	ssh:connect(Host, Port, [{silently_accept_hosts, true},
  422:                                  {save_accepted_host, false},
  423: 				 {user, "bandit"},
  424: 				 {password, "pwd breaking"},
  425: 				 {user_interaction, false},
  426: 				 {user_dir, UserDir}]),
  427:     ssh:stop_daemon(Pid).
  428: 
  429:     
  430: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  431: server_keyboard_interactive(Config) ->
  432:     UserDir = proplists:get_value(user_dir, Config),
  433:     SysDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  434:     %% Test that the state works
  435:     Parent = self(),
  436:     PWDFUN = fun("foo",P="bar",_,S) -> Parent!{P,S},true; 
  437: 		(_,P,_,S=undefined) -> Parent!{P,S},{false,1}; 
  438: 		(_,P,_,S) -> Parent!{P,S},          {false,S+1}
  439: 	     end,
  440:     {Pid, Host, Port} = ssh_test_lib:daemon([{system_dir, SysDir},
  441: 					     {user_dir, UserDir},
  442: 					     {auth_methods,"keyboard-interactive"},
  443: 					     {pwdfun,PWDFUN}]),
  444: 
  445:     %% Try with passwords "incorrect", "Bad again" and finally "bar"
  446:     KIFFUN = fun(_Name, _Instr, _PromptInfos) ->
  447: 		     K={k,self()},
  448:                      Answer =
  449:                          case get(K) of
  450:                              undefined ->
  451:                                  put(K,1),
  452:                                  ["incorrect"];
  453:                              2 ->
  454:                                  put(K,3),
  455:                                  ["bar"];
  456:                              S->
  457:                                  put(K,S+1),
  458:                                  ["Bad again"]
  459:                          end,
  460:                      ct:log("keyboard_interact_fun:~n"
  461:                             " Name        = ~p~n"
  462:                             " Instruction = ~p~n"
  463:                             " Prompts     = ~p~n"
  464:                             "~nAnswer:~n  ~p~n",
  465:                             [_Name, _Instr, _PromptInfos, Answer]),
  466: 
  467:                      Answer
  468: 	     end,
  469:     
  470:     ConnectionRef2 = 
  471: 	ssh_test_lib:connect(Host, Port, [{silently_accept_hosts, true},
  472: 					  {user, "foo"},
  473: 					  {keyboard_interact_fun, KIFFUN},
  474: 					  {user_dir, UserDir}]),
  475:     ssh:close(ConnectionRef2),
  476:     ssh:stop_daemon(Pid),
  477: 
  478:     lists:foreach(fun(Expect) ->
  479: 			  receive
  480: 			      Expect -> ok;
  481: 			      Other -> ct:fail("Expect: ~p~nReceived ~p",[Expect,Other])
  482: 			  after
  483: 			      2000 -> ct:fail("Timeout expecting ~p",[Expect])
  484: 			  end
  485: 		  end, [{"incorrect",undefined},
  486: 			{"Bad again",1},
  487: 			{"bar",2}]).
  488: 
  489: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  490: server_keyboard_interactive_extra_msg(Config) ->
  491:     UserDir = proplists:get_value(user_dir, Config),
  492:     SysDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  493:     {Pid, Host, Port} = ssh_test_lib:daemon([{system_dir, SysDir},
  494: 					     {user_dir, UserDir},
  495: 					     {auth_methods,"keyboard-interactive"},
  496:                                              {tstflg, [{one_empty,true}]},
  497:                                              {user_passwords, [{"foo","bar"}]}
  498:                                             ]),
  499: 
  500:     ConnectionRef =
  501: 	ssh_test_lib:connect(Host, Port, [{silently_accept_hosts, true},
  502: 					  {user, "foo"},
  503: 					  {password, "bar"},
  504: 					  {user_dir, UserDir}]),
  505:     ssh:close(ConnectionRef),
  506:     ssh:stop_daemon(Pid).
  507: 
  508: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  509: auth_method_kb_interactive_data_tuple(Config) ->
  510:     T = {"abc1", "def1", "ghi1: ", true},
  511:     amkid(Config, T, T).
  512: 
  513: auth_method_kb_interactive_data_fun3(Config) ->
  514:     T = {"abc2", "def2", "ghi2: ", true},
  515:     amkid(Config, T,
  516:           fun(_Peer, _User, _Service) -> T end
  517:          ).
  518: 
  519: auth_method_kb_interactive_data_fun4(Config) ->
  520:     T = {"abc3", "def3", "ghi3: ", true},
  521:     amkid(Config, T,
  522:           fun(_Peer, _User, _Service, _State) -> T end
  523:          ).
  524: 
  525: amkid(Config, {ExpectName,ExpectInstr,ExpectPrompts,ExpectEcho}, OptVal) ->
  526:     UserDir = proplists:get_value(user_dir, Config),
  527:     SysDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  528:     %% Test that the state works
  529:     Parent = self(),
  530:     PWDFUN = fun("foo",P="bar",_,S) -> Parent!{P,S},true;
  531: 		(_,P,_,S=undefined) -> Parent!{P,S},{false,1};
  532: 		(_,P,_,S) -> Parent!{P,S},          {false,S+1}
  533: 	     end,
  534:     {Pid, Host, Port} = ssh_test_lib:daemon([{system_dir, SysDir},
  535: 					     {user_dir, UserDir},
  536: 					     {auth_methods,"keyboard-interactive"},
  537: 					     {pwdfun,PWDFUN},
  538:                                              {auth_method_kb_interactive_data,OptVal}
  539:                                             ]),
  540: 
  541:     KIFFUN = fun(Name, Instr, PromptInfos) ->
  542: 		     K={k,self()},
  543:                      Answer =
  544:                          case get(K) of
  545:                              undefined ->
  546:                                  put(K,1),
  547:                                  ["incorrect"];
  548:                              2 ->
  549:                                  put(K,3),
  550:                                  ["bar"];
  551:                              S->
  552:                                  put(K,S+1),
  553:                                  ["Bad again"]
  554:                          end,
  555:                      ct:log("keyboard_interact_fun:~n"
  556:                             " Name        = ~p~n"
  557:                             " Instruction = ~p~n"
  558:                             " Prompts     = ~p~n"
  559:                             "~nAnswer:~n  ~p~n",
  560:                             [Name, Instr, PromptInfos, Answer]),
  561:                      case {binary_to_list(Name),
  562:                            binary_to_list(Instr),
  563:                            [{binary_to_list(PI),Echo} || {PI,Echo} <- PromptInfos]
  564:                           } of
  565:                          {ExpectName, ExpectInstr, [{ExpectPrompts,ExpectEcho}]} ->
  566:                              ct:log("Match!", []),
  567:                              Answer;
  568:                          _ ->
  569:                              ct:log("Not match!~n"
  570:                                     " ExpectName        = ~p~n"
  571:                                     " ExpectInstruction = ~p~n"
  572:                                     " ExpectPrompts     = ~p~n",
  573:                                     [ExpectName, ExpectInstr, [{ExpectPrompts,ExpectEcho}]]),
  574:                              ct:fail("no_match")
  575:                      end
  576: 	     end,
  577:     ssh_dbg:start(), ssh_dbg:on(authentication), %% Test dbg code
  578:     ConnectionRef2 =
  579: 	ssh_test_lib:connect(Host, Port, [{silently_accept_hosts, true},
  580: 					  {user, "foo"},
  581: 					  {keyboard_interact_fun, KIFFUN},
  582: 					  {user_dir, UserDir}]),
  583:     ssh_dbg:stop(),
  584:     ssh:close(ConnectionRef2),
  585:     ssh:stop_daemon(Pid),
  586: 
  587:     lists:foreach(fun(Expect) ->
  588: 			  receive
  589: 			      Expect -> ok;
  590: 			      Other -> ct:fail("Expect: ~p~nReceived ~p",[Expect,Other])
  591: 			  after
  592: 			      2000 -> ct:fail("Timeout expecting ~p",[Expect])
  593: 			  end
  594: 		  end, [{"incorrect",undefined},
  595: 			{"Bad again",1},
  596: 			{"bar",2}]).
  597: 
  598: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  599: auth_none(Config) ->
  600:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  601:     UserDir = filename:join(PrivDir, nopubkey), % to make sure we don't use public-key-auth
  602:     file:make_dir(UserDir),
  603:     SysDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  604:     {DaemonRef, Host, Port} =
  605: 	ssh_test_lib:daemon([{system_dir, SysDir},
  606: 			     {user_dir, UserDir},
  607: 			     {auth_methods, "password"}, % to make even more sure we don't use public-key-auth
  608: 			     {user_passwords, [{"foo","somepwd"}]}, % Not to be used
  609:                              {no_auth_needed, true} % we test this
  610: 			    ]),
  611:     ClientConnRef1 =
  612: 	ssh_test_lib:connect(Host, Port, [{silently_accept_hosts, true},
  613: 					  {user, "some-other-user"},
  614: 					  {password, "wrong-pwd"},
  615: 					  {user_dir, UserDir},
  616: 					  {user_interaction, false}]),
  617:     [{user_auth, "none"}] =
  618:         ssh:connection_info(ClientConnRef1, [user_auth]),
  619:     "some-other-user" =
  620:         proplists:get_value(user, ssh:connection_info(ClientConnRef1, [user])),
  621:     ok = ssh:close(ClientConnRef1),
  622:     ok = ssh:stop_daemon(DaemonRef).
  623: 
  624: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  625: system_dir_option(Config) ->
  626:     DirUnread = proplists:get_value(unreadable_dir,Config),
  627:     FileRead = proplists:get_value(readable_file,Config),
  628: 
  629:     case ssh_test_lib:daemon([{system_dir, DirUnread}]) of
  630: 	{error,{eoptions,{{system_dir,DirUnread},eacces}}} ->
  631: 	    ok;
  632: 	{Pid1,_Host1,Port1} when is_pid(Pid1),is_integer(Port1) ->
  633: 	    ssh:stop_daemon(Pid1),
  634: 	    ct:fail("Didn't detect that dir is unreadable", [])
  635: 	end,
  636:     
  637:     case ssh_test_lib:daemon([{system_dir, FileRead}]) of
  638: 	{error,{eoptions,{{system_dir,FileRead},enotdir}}} ->
  639: 	    ok;
  640: 	{Pid2,_Host2,Port2} when is_pid(Pid2),is_integer(Port2) ->
  641: 	    ssh:stop_daemon(Pid2),
  642: 	    ct:fail("Didn't detect that option is a plain file", [])
  643:     end.
  644: 
  645: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  646: user_dir_option(Config) ->
  647:     DirUnread = proplists:get_value(unreadable_dir,Config),
  648:     FileRead = proplists:get_value(readable_file,Config),
  649:     %% Any port will do (beware, implementation knowledge!):
  650:     Port = 65535,
  651: 
  652:     case ssh:connect("localhost", Port, [{user_dir, DirUnread},
  653:                                          {save_accepted_host, false}]) of
  654: 	{error,{eoptions,{{user_dir,DirUnread},eacces}}} ->
  655: 	    ok;
  656: 	{error,econnrefused} ->
  657: 	    ct:fail("Didn't detect that dir is unreadable", [])
  658:     end,
  659: 
  660:     case ssh:connect("localhost", Port, [{user_dir, FileRead},
  661:                                          {save_accepted_host, false}]) of
  662: 	{error,{eoptions,{{user_dir,FileRead},enotdir}}} ->
  663: 	    ok;
  664: 	{error,econnrefused} ->
  665: 	    ct:fail("Didn't detect that option is a plain file", [])
  666:     end.
  667: 
  668: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  669: user_dir_fun_option(Config) ->
  670:     DataDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  671:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  672:     SysDir = filename:join(PrivDir,"system"),
  673:     ssh_test_lib:setup_all_host_keys(DataDir, SysDir),
  674:     UserDir = filename:join(PrivDir,"user"),
  675:     ssh_test_lib:setup_all_user_keys(DataDir, UserDir),
  676: 
  677:     Parent = self(),
  678:     Ref = make_ref(),
  679:     {Pid, Host, Port} = ssh_test_lib:daemon([{system_dir, SysDir},
  680: 					     {user_dir_fun, fun(User) ->
  681:                                                                     ct:log("user_dir_fun called ~p",[User]),
  682:                                                                     Parent ! {user,Ref,User},
  683:                                                                     UserDir
  684:                                                             end},
  685: 					     {failfun, fun ssh_test_lib:failfun/2}]),
  686:     ConnectionRef =
  687: 	ssh_test_lib:connect(Host, Port, [{silently_accept_hosts, true},
  688: 					  {user, "foo"},
  689: 					  {user_dir, UserDir},
  690:                                           {auth_methods,"publickey"},
  691: 					  {user_interaction, false}]),
  692:     [{user_auth, "publickey"}] =
  693:         ssh:connection_info(ConnectionRef, [user_auth]),
  694:     receive
  695:         {user,Ref,"foo"} ->
  696:             ssh:stop_daemon(Pid),
  697:             ok;
  698:         {user,Ref,What} ->
  699:             ssh:stop_daemon(Pid),
  700:             ct:log("Got ~p",[What]),
  701:             {fail, bad_userid}
  702:     after 2000 ->
  703:             ssh:stop_daemon(Pid),
  704:             {fail,timeout_in_receive}
  705:     end.
  706: 
  707: 
  708: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  709: %%% validate client that uses the 'ssh_msg_debug_fun' option
  710: ssh_msg_debug_fun_option_client(Config) ->
  711:     UserDir = proplists:get_value(user_dir, Config),
  712:     SysDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  713: 
  714:     {Pid, Host, Port} = ssh_test_lib:daemon([{system_dir, SysDir},
  715: 					     {user_dir, UserDir},
  716: 					     {password, "morot"},
  717: 					     {failfun, fun ssh_test_lib:failfun/2}]),
  718:     Parent = self(),
  719:     DbgFun = fun(ConnRef,Displ,Msg,Lang) -> Parent ! {msg_dbg,{ConnRef,Displ,Msg,Lang}} end,
  720: 		
  721:     ConnectionRef =
  722: 	ssh_test_lib:connect(Host, Port, [{silently_accept_hosts, true},
  723: 					  {user, "foo"},
  724: 					  {password, "morot"},
  725: 					  {user_dir, UserDir},
  726: 					  {user_interaction, false},
  727: 					  {ssh_msg_debug_fun,DbgFun}]),
  728:     %% Beware, implementation knowledge:
  729:     gen_statem:cast(ConnectionRef,{ssh_msg_debug,false,<<"Hello">>,<<>>}),
  730:     receive
  731: 	{msg_dbg,X={ConnectionRef,false,<<"Hello">>,<<>>}} ->
  732: 	    ct:log("Got expected dbg msg ~p",[X]),
  733: 	    ssh:stop_daemon(Pid);
  734: 	{msg_dbg,X={_,false,<<"Hello">>,<<>>}} ->
  735: 	    ct:log("Got dbg msg but bad ConnectionRef (~p expected) ~p",[ConnectionRef,X]),
  736: 	    ssh:stop_daemon(Pid),
  737: 	    {fail, "Bad ConnectionRef received"};
  738: 	{msg_dbg,X} ->
  739: 	    ct:log("Got bad dbg msg ~p",[X]),
  740: 	    ssh:stop_daemon(Pid),
  741: 	    {fail,"Bad msg received"}
  742:     after 1000 ->
  743: 	    ssh:stop_daemon(Pid),
  744: 	    {fail,timeout}
  745:     end.
  746: 
  747: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  748: connectfun_disconnectfun_server(Config) ->
  749:     UserDir = proplists:get_value(user_dir, Config),
  750:     SysDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  751: 
  752:     Parent = self(),
  753:     Ref = make_ref(),
  754:     ConnFun = fun(_,_,_) -> Parent ! {connect,Ref} end,
  755:     DiscFun = fun(R) -> Parent ! {disconnect,Ref,R} end,
  756: 
  757:     {Pid, Host, Port} = ssh_test_lib:daemon([{system_dir, SysDir},
  758: 					     {user_dir, UserDir},
  759: 					     {password, "morot"},
  760: 					     {failfun, fun ssh_test_lib:failfun/2},
  761: 					     {disconnectfun, DiscFun},
  762: 					     {connectfun, ConnFun}]),
  763:     ConnectionRef =
  764: 	ssh_test_lib:connect(Host, Port, [{silently_accept_hosts, true},
  765: 					  {user, "foo"},
  766: 					  {password, "morot"},
  767: 					  {user_dir, UserDir},
  768: 					  {user_interaction, false}]),
  769:     receive
  770: 	{connect,Ref} ->
  771: 	    ssh:close(ConnectionRef),
  772: 	    receive
  773: 		{disconnect,Ref,R} ->
  774: 		    ct:log("Disconnect result: ~p",[R]),
  775: 		    ssh:stop_daemon(Pid)
  776: 	    after 10000 ->
  777: 		    receive
  778: 			X -> ct:log("received ~p",[X])
  779: 		    after 0 -> ok
  780: 		    end,
  781: 		    {fail, "No disconnectfun action"}
  782: 	    end
  783:     after 10000 ->
  784: 	    receive
  785: 		X -> ct:log("received ~p",[X])
  786: 	    after 0 -> ok
  787: 	    end,
  788: 	    {fail, "No connectfun action"}
  789:     end.
  790: 
  791: 
  792: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  793: connectfun4_server(Config) ->
  794:     UserDir = proplists:get_value(user_dir, Config),
  795:     SysDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  796: 
  797:     Parent = self(),
  798:     Ref = make_ref(),
  799:     ConnFun = fun(User,_,Method,ConnInfo) -> Parent ! {connect,Ref,User,Method,ConnInfo} end,
  800: 
  801:     {Pid, Host, Port} = ssh_test_lib:daemon([{system_dir, SysDir},
  802: 					     {user_dir, UserDir},
  803: 					     {password, "morot"},
  804: 					     {failfun, fun ssh_test_lib:failfun/2},
  805: 					     {connectfun, ConnFun}]),
  806:     ConnectionRef =
  807: 	ssh_test_lib:connect(Host, Port, [{silently_accept_hosts, true},
  808: 					  {user, "foo"},
  809: 					  {password, "morot"},
  810: 					  {user_dir, UserDir},
  811: 					  {user_interaction, false}]),
  812:     [{user_auth, "keyboard-interactive"}] =
  813: 	ssh:connection_info(ConnectionRef, [user_auth]),
  814: 
  815:     receive
  816: 	{connect,Ref,User,Method,ConnInfo} ->
  817:             "foo" = User,
  818:             "foo" = proplists:get_value(user, ConnInfo),
  819:             "keyboard-interactive" = Method,
  820:             Keys = [client_version, server_version, peer, user, sockname, options, algorithms],
  821:             true = lists:all(fun({K, _}) -> lists:member(K, Keys) end, ConnInfo),
  822: 	    ssh:close(ConnectionRef),
  823:             ssh:stop_daemon(Pid)
  824:     after 10000 ->
  825: 	    receive
  826: 		X -> ct:log("received ~p",[X])
  827: 	    after 0 -> ok
  828: 	    end,
  829: 	    {fail, "No connectfun action"}
  830:     end.
  831: 
  832: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  833: connectfun_disconnectfun_client(Config) ->
  834:     UserDir = proplists:get_value(user_dir, Config),
  835:     SysDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  836: 
  837:     Parent = self(),
  838:     Ref = make_ref(),
  839:     DiscFun = fun(R) -> Parent ! {disconnect,Ref,R} end,
  840: 
  841:     {Pid, Host, Port} = ssh_test_lib:daemon([{system_dir, SysDir},
  842: 					     {user_dir, UserDir},
  843: 					     {password, "morot"},
  844: 					     {failfun, fun ssh_test_lib:failfun/2}]),
  845:     _ConnectionRef =
  846: 	ssh_test_lib:connect(Host, Port, [{silently_accept_hosts, true},
  847: 					  {user, "foo"},
  848: 					  {password, "morot"},
  849: 					  {user_dir, UserDir},
  850: 					  {disconnectfun, DiscFun},
  851: 					  {user_interaction, false}]),
  852:     ssh:stop_daemon(Pid),
  853:     receive
  854: 	{disconnect,Ref,R} ->
  855: 	    ct:log("Disconnect result: ~p",[R])
  856:     after 2000 ->
  857: 	    {fail, "No disconnectfun action"}
  858:     end.
  859: 
  860: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  861: %% The client disconnects due to the server
  862: disconnectfun2_client(Config) ->
  863:     UserDir = proplists:get_value(user_dir, Config),
  864:     SysDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  865: 
  866:     Parent = self(),
  867:     Ref = make_ref(),
  868:     DiscFun = fun(R, Extra) -> Parent ! {disconnect,Ref,R,Extra} end,
  869: 
  870:     {Pid, Host, Port} = ssh_test_lib:daemon([{system_dir, SysDir},
  871: 					     {user_dir, UserDir},
  872: 					     {password, "morot"},
  873: 					     {failfun, fun ssh_test_lib:failfun/2}]),
  874:     _ConnectionRef =
  875: 	ssh_test_lib:connect(Host, Port, [{silently_accept_hosts, true},
  876: 					  {user, "foo"},
  877: 					  {password, "morot"},
  878: 					  {user_dir, UserDir},
  879: 					  {disconnectfun, DiscFun},
  880: 					  {user_interaction, false}]),
  881:     ssh:stop_daemon(Pid),
  882:     receive
  883: 	{disconnect,Ref,R,Extra} ->
  884:             %% Code and Details are undefined for this particular case,
  885:             %% code is only available when a disconnect message is sent and details
  886:             %% are not available when receiving a disconnect or the transport
  887:             %% is closed.
  888:             #{code := undefined, details := undefined, connection_info := ConnInfo} = Extra,
  889:             Keys = [client_version, server_version, peer, user, sockname, options,
  890:                     algorithms, user_auth],
  891:             true = lists:all(fun({K, _}) -> lists:member(K, Keys) end, ConnInfo),
  892: 	    ct:log("Disconnect result: ~p ~p",[R, Extra])
  893:     after 2000 ->
  894: 	    {fail, "No disconnectfun action"}
  895:     end.
  896: 
  897: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  898: %% Password authentication fails and there's no more authentication
  899: %% methods to try so the client disconnects with
  900: %% SSH_DISCONNECT_NO_MORE_AUTH_METHODS_AVAILABLE
  901: disconnectfun2_server(Config) ->
  902:     UserDir = proplists:get_value(user_dir, Config),
  903:     SysDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  904: 
  905:     Parent = self(),
  906:     Ref = make_ref(),
  907:     DiscFunS = fun(R, Extra) -> Parent ! {disconnect_server,Ref,R,Extra} end,
  908:     DiscFunC = fun(R, Extra) -> Parent ! {disconnect_client,Ref,R,Extra} end,
  909:     {Pid, Host, Port} = ssh_test_lib:daemon([{system_dir, SysDir},
  910: 					     {user_dir, UserDir},
  911:                                              {disconnectfun, DiscFunS},
  912: 					     {password, "morot"}]),
  913:     {error, Reason} =
  914: 	ssh:connect(Host, Port, [{silently_accept_hosts, true},
  915:                                  {save_accepted_host, false},
  916:                                  {user, "foo"},
  917:                                  {password, "wrong_password"},
  918:                                  {user_dir, UserDir},
  919:                                  {user_interaction, false},
  920:                                  {disconnectfun, DiscFunC}]),
  921:     ct:log("Error reason: ~p", [Reason]),
  922:     Res =
  923:         receive
  924:             {disconnect_client,Ref,R,Extra} ->
  925:                 #{code := 14, details := Details, connection_info := ConnInfo} = Extra,
  926:                 <<"User auth failed for: \"foo\"">> = iolist_to_binary(Details),
  927:                 Keys = [client_version, server_version, peer, user, sockname, options,
  928:                         algorithms, user_auth],
  929:                 true = lists:all(fun({K, _}) -> lists:member(K, Keys) end, ConnInfo),
  930:                 ct:log("Disconnect result client: ~p ~p",[R, Extra]),
  931:                 receive
  932:                     {disconnect_server,RefS,RS,ExtraS} ->
  933:                         <<"Received disconnect: "
  934:                           "Unable to connect using the available authentication methods">> =
  935:                             iolist_to_binary(RS),
  936:                         %% Details and Code are undefined for this particular case
  937:                         #{code := undefined,
  938:                           details := undefined,
  939:                           connection_info := ConnInfoS} = ExtraS,
  940:                         KeysS = [client_version, server_version, peer, user, sockname, options,
  941:                                 algorithms, user_auth],
  942:                         true = lists:all(fun({K, _}) -> lists:member(K, KeysS) end, ConnInfoS),
  943:                         ct:log("Disconnect result server: ~p ~p",[RS, ExtraS])
  944:                 after 2000 ->
  945:                         {fail, "No disconnectfun action for server"}
  946:                 end
  947:         after 2000 ->
  948:                 {fail, "No disconnectfun action"}
  949:         end,
  950:     ssh:stop_daemon(Pid),
  951:     Res.
  952: 
  953: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  954: %%% validate client that uses the 'ssh_msg_debug_fun' option
  955: ssh_msg_debug_fun_option_server(Config) ->
  956:     UserDir = proplists:get_value(user_dir, Config),
  957:     SysDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  958: 
  959:     Parent = self(),
  960:     DbgFun = fun(ConnRef,Displ,Msg,Lang) -> Parent ! {msg_dbg,{ConnRef,Displ,Msg,Lang}} end,
  961:     ConnFun = fun(_,_,_) -> Parent ! {connection_pid,self()} end,
  962: 
  963:     {Pid, Host, Port} = ssh_test_lib:daemon([{system_dir, SysDir},
  964: 					     {user_dir, UserDir},
  965: 					     {password, "morot"},
  966: 					     {failfun, fun ssh_test_lib:failfun/2},
  967: 					     {connectfun, ConnFun},
  968: 					     {ssh_msg_debug_fun, DbgFun}]),
  969:     _ConnectionRef =
  970: 	ssh_test_lib:connect(Host, Port, [{silently_accept_hosts, true},
  971: 					  {user, "foo"},
  972: 					  {password, "morot"},
  973: 					  {user_dir, UserDir},
  974: 					  {user_interaction, false}]),
  975:     receive
  976: 	{connection_pid,Server} ->
  977: 	    %% Beware, implementation knowledge:
  978: 	    gen_statem:cast(Server,{ssh_msg_debug,false,<<"Hello">>,<<>>}),
  979: 	    receive
  980: 		{msg_dbg,X={_,false,<<"Hello">>,<<>>}} ->
  981: 		    ct:log("Got expected dbg msg ~p",[X]),
  982: 		    ssh:stop_daemon(Pid);
  983: 		{msg_dbg,X} ->
  984: 		    ct:log("Got bad dbg msg ~p",[X]),
  985: 		    ssh:stop_daemon(Pid),
  986: 		    {fail,"Bad msg received"}
  987: 	    after 3000 ->
  988: 		    ssh:stop_daemon(Pid),
  989: 		    {fail,timeout2}
  990: 	    end
  991:     after 3000 ->
  992: 	    ssh:stop_daemon(Pid),
  993: 	    {fail,timeout1}
  994:     end.
  995: 
  996: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  997: disconnectfun_option_server(Config) ->
  998:     UserDir = proplists:get_value(user_dir, Config),
  999:     SysDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
 1000: 
 1001:     Parent = self(),
 1002:     DisConnFun = fun(Reason) -> Parent ! {disconnect,Reason} end,
 1003: 
 1004:     {Pid, Host, Port} = ssh_test_lib:daemon([{system_dir, SysDir},
 1005: 					     {user_dir, UserDir},
 1006: 					     {password, "morot"},
 1007: 					     {failfun, fun ssh_test_lib:failfun/2},
 1008: 					     {disconnectfun, DisConnFun}]),
 1009:     ConnectionRef =
 1010: 	ssh_test_lib:connect(Host, Port, [{silently_accept_hosts, true},
 1011: 					  {user, "foo"},
 1012: 					  {password, "morot"},
 1013: 					  {user_dir, UserDir},
 1014: 					  {user_interaction, false}]),
 1015:     ssh:close(ConnectionRef),
 1016:     receive
 1017: 	{disconnect,Reason} ->
 1018: 	    ct:log("Server detected disconnect: ~p",[Reason]),
 1019: 	    ssh:stop_daemon(Pid),
 1020: 	    ok
 1021:     after 5000 ->
 1022: 	    receive
 1023: 		X -> ct:log("received ~p",[X])
 1024: 	    after 0 -> ok
 1025: 	    end,
 1026: 	    {fail,"Timeout waiting for disconnect"}
 1027:     end.
 1028: 
 1029: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1030: disconnectfun_option_client(Config) ->
 1031:     UserDir = proplists:get_value(user_dir, Config),
 1032:     SysDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
 1033: 
 1034:     Parent = self(),
 1035:     DisConnFun = fun(Reason) -> Parent ! {disconnect,Reason} end,
 1036: 
 1037:     {Pid, Host, Port} = ssh_test_lib:daemon([{system_dir, SysDir},
 1038: 					     {user_dir, UserDir},
 1039: 					     {password, "morot"},
 1040: 					     {failfun, fun ssh_test_lib:failfun/2}]),
 1041:     _ConnectionRef =
 1042: 	ssh_test_lib:connect(Host, Port, [{silently_accept_hosts, true},
 1043: 					  {user, "foo"},
 1044: 					  {password, "morot"},
 1045: 					  {user_dir, UserDir},
 1046: 					  {user_interaction, false},
 1047: 					  {disconnectfun, DisConnFun}]),
 1048:     ssh:stop_daemon(Pid),
 1049:     receive
 1050: 	{disconnect,Reason} ->
 1051: 	    ct:log("Client detected disconnect: ~p",[Reason]),
 1052: 	    ok
 1053:     after 3000 ->
 1054: 	    receive
 1055: 		X -> ct:log("received ~p",[X])
 1056: 	    after 0 -> ok
 1057: 	    end,
 1058: 	    {fail,"Timeout waiting for disconnect"}
 1059:     end.
 1060: 
 1061: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1062: unexpectedfun_option_server(Config) ->
 1063:     UserDir = proplists:get_value(user_dir, Config),
 1064:     SysDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
 1065: 
 1066:     Parent = self(),
 1067:     ConnFun = fun(_,_,_) -> Parent ! {connection_pid,self()} end,
 1068:     UnexpFun = fun(Msg,Peer) ->
 1069: 		       Parent ! {unexpected,Msg,Peer,self()},
 1070: 		       skip
 1071: 	       end,
 1072: 
 1073:     {Pid, Host, Port} = ssh_test_lib:daemon([{system_dir, SysDir},
 1074: 					     {user_dir, UserDir},
 1075: 					     {password, "morot"},
 1076: 					     {failfun, fun ssh_test_lib:failfun/2},
 1077: 					     {connectfun, ConnFun},
 1078: 					     {unexpectedfun, UnexpFun}]),
 1079:     _ConnectionRef =
 1080: 	ssh_test_lib:connect(Host, Port, [{silently_accept_hosts, true},
 1081: 					  {user, "foo"},
 1082: 					  {password, "morot"},
 1083: 					  {user_dir, UserDir},
 1084: 					  {user_interaction, false}]),
 1085:     receive
 1086: 	{connection_pid,Server} ->
 1087: 	    %% Beware, implementation knowledge:
 1088: 	    Server ! unexpected_message,
 1089: 	    receive
 1090: 		{unexpected, unexpected_message, {{_,_,_,_},_}, _} -> ok;
 1091: 		{unexpected, unexpected_message, Peer, _} -> ct:fail("Bad peer ~p",[Peer]);
 1092: 		M = {unexpected, _, _, _} -> ct:fail("Bad msg ~p",[M])
 1093: 	    after 3000 ->
 1094: 		    ssh:stop_daemon(Pid),
 1095: 		    {fail,timeout2}
 1096: 	    end
 1097:     after 3000 ->
 1098: 	    ssh:stop_daemon(Pid),
 1099: 	    {fail,timeout1}
 1100:     end.
 1101: 
 1102: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1103: unexpectedfun_option_client(Config) ->
 1104:     UserDir = proplists:get_value(user_dir, Config),
 1105:     SysDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
 1106: 
 1107:     Parent = self(),
 1108:     UnexpFun = fun(Msg,Peer) -> 
 1109: 		       Parent ! {unexpected,Msg,Peer,self()},
 1110: 		       skip
 1111: 	       end,
 1112: 
 1113:     {Pid, Host, Port} = ssh_test_lib:daemon([{system_dir, SysDir},
 1114: 					     {user_dir, UserDir},
 1115: 					     {password, "morot"},
 1116: 					     {failfun, fun ssh_test_lib:failfun/2}]),
 1117:     ConnectionRef =
 1118: 	ssh_test_lib:connect(Host, Port, [{silently_accept_hosts, true},
 1119: 					  {user, "foo"},
 1120: 					  {password, "morot"},
 1121: 					  {user_dir, UserDir},
 1122: 					  {user_interaction, false},
 1123: 					  {unexpectedfun, UnexpFun}]),
 1124:     %% Beware, implementation knowledge:
 1125:     ConnectionRef ! unexpected_message,
 1126: 
 1127:     receive
 1128: 	{unexpected, unexpected_message, {{_,_,_,_},_}, ConnectionRef} ->
 1129: 	    ok;
 1130: 	{unexpected, unexpected_message, Peer, ConnectionRef} ->
 1131: 	    ct:fail("Bad peer ~p",[Peer]);
 1132: 	M = {unexpected, _, _, _} ->
 1133: 	    ct:fail("Bad msg ~p",[M])
 1134:     after 3000 ->
 1135: 	    ssh:stop_daemon(Pid),
 1136: 	    {fail,timeout}
 1137:     end.
 1138: 
 1139: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1140: hostkey_fingerprint_check(Config) ->
 1141:     do_hostkey_fingerprint_check(Config, old).
 1142: 
 1143: hostkey_fingerprint_check_md5(Config) ->
 1144:     do_hostkey_fingerprint_check(Config, md5).
 1145: 
 1146: hostkey_fingerprint_check_sha(Config) ->
 1147:     do_hostkey_fingerprint_check(Config, sha).
 1148: 
 1149: hostkey_fingerprint_check_sha256(Config) ->
 1150:     do_hostkey_fingerprint_check(Config, sha256).
 1151: 
 1152: hostkey_fingerprint_check_sha384(Config) ->
 1153:     do_hostkey_fingerprint_check(Config, sha384).
 1154: 
 1155: hostkey_fingerprint_check_sha512(Config) ->
 1156:     do_hostkey_fingerprint_check(Config, sha512).
 1157: 
 1158: hostkey_fingerprint_check_list(Config) ->
 1159:     do_hostkey_fingerprint_check(Config, [sha,md5,sha256]).
 1160: 
 1161: %%%----
 1162: do_hostkey_fingerprint_check(Config, HashAlg) ->
 1163:     case supported_hash(HashAlg) of
 1164: 	true ->
 1165: 	    really_do_hostkey_fingerprint_check(Config, HashAlg);
 1166: 	false when HashAlg == old ->
 1167: 	    {skip,{unsupported_hash,md5}};% Happen to know that ssh:hostkey_fingerprint/1 uses md5...
 1168: 	false ->
 1169: 	    {skip,{unsupported_hash,HashAlg}}
 1170:     end.
 1171: 
 1172: supported_hash(old) ->
 1173:     supported_hash(md5); % Happen to know that ssh:hostkey_fingerprint/1 uses md5...
 1174: supported_hash(HashAlg) ->
 1175:     Hs = if is_atom(HashAlg) -> [HashAlg];
 1176:             is_list(HashAlg) -> HashAlg
 1177:          end,
 1178:     [] == (Hs -- proplists:get_value(hashs, crypto:supports(), [])).
 1179: 
 1180: 
 1181: really_do_hostkey_fingerprint_check(Config, HashAlg) ->
 1182:     UserDir = proplists:get_value(user_dir, Config),
 1183:     SysDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
 1184: 
 1185:     %% All host key fingerprints.  Trust that public_key has checked the hostkey_fingerprint
 1186:     %% function since that function is used by the ssh client...
 1187:     FPs0 = [case HashAlg of
 1188: 	       old -> ssh:hostkey_fingerprint(Key);
 1189: 	       _ -> ssh:hostkey_fingerprint(HashAlg, Key)
 1190: 	   end
 1191: 	   || FileCandidate <- begin
 1192: 				   {ok,KeyFileCands} = file:list_dir(SysDir),
 1193: 				   KeyFileCands
 1194: 			       end,
 1195: 	      nomatch =/= re:run(FileCandidate, ".*\\.pub", []),
 1196: 	      {Key,_Cmnts} <- begin
 1197: 				  {ok,Bin} = file:read_file(filename:join(SysDir, FileCandidate)),
 1198: 				  try ssh_file:decode(Bin, public_key)
 1199: 				  catch
 1200: 				      _:_ -> []
 1201: 				  end
 1202: 			      end],
 1203:     FPs = if is_atom(HashAlg) -> FPs0;
 1204:              is_list(HashAlg) -> lists:concat(FPs0)
 1205:           end,
 1206:     ct:log("Fingerprints(~p) = ~p",[HashAlg,FPs]),
 1207: 
 1208:     %% Start daemon with the public keys that we got fingerprints from
 1209:     {Pid, Host0, Port} = ssh_test_lib:daemon([{system_dir, SysDir},
 1210: 					     {user_dir, UserDir},
 1211: 					     {password, "morot"}]),
 1212:     Host = ssh_test_lib:ntoa(Host0),
 1213:     FP_check_fun = fun(PeerName, FP) ->
 1214: 			   ct:log("PeerName = ~p, FP = ~p",[PeerName,FP]),
 1215: 			   HostCheck = ssh_test_lib:match_ip(Host, PeerName),
 1216: 			   FPCheck = 
 1217:                                if is_atom(HashAlg) -> lists:member(FP, FPs);
 1218:                                   is_list(HashAlg) -> lists:all(fun(FP1) -> lists:member(FP1,FPs) end,
 1219:                                                                 FP)
 1220:                                end,
 1221: 			   ct:log("check ~p == ~p (~p) and ~n~p~n in ~p (~p)~n",
 1222: 				  [PeerName,Host,HostCheck,FP,FPs,FPCheck]),
 1223: 			   HostCheck and FPCheck
 1224: 		   end,
 1225:     
 1226:     ssh_test_lib:connect(Host, Port, [{silently_accept_hosts,
 1227: 				       case HashAlg of
 1228: 					   old -> FP_check_fun;
 1229: 					   _ -> {HashAlg, FP_check_fun}
 1230: 				       end},
 1231: 				      {user, "foo"},
 1232: 				      {password, "morot"},
 1233: 				      {user_dir, UserDir},
 1234:                                       {save_accepted_host, false}, % Ensure no 'known_hosts' disturbs
 1235: 				      {user_interaction, false}]),
 1236:     ssh:stop_daemon(Pid).
 1237: 
 1238: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1239: %%% Test connect_timeout option in ssh:connect/4
 1240: ssh_connect_timeout(_Config) ->
 1241:     ConnTimeout = 2000,
 1242:     {error,{faked_transport,connect,TimeoutToTransport}} = 
 1243: 	ssh:connect("localhost", 12345, 
 1244: 		    [{transport,{tcp,?MODULE,tcp_closed}},
 1245:                      {save_accepted_host, false},
 1246: 		     {connect_timeout,ConnTimeout}],
 1247: 		    1000),
 1248:     case TimeoutToTransport of
 1249: 	ConnTimeout -> ok;
 1250: 	Other -> 
 1251: 	    ct:log("connect_timeout is ~p but transport received ~p",[ConnTimeout,Other]),
 1252: 	    {fail,"ssh:connect/4 wrong connect_timeout received in transport"}
 1253:     end.
 1254:     
 1255: %% Plugin function for the test above
 1256: connect(_Host, _Port, _Opts, Timeout) ->
 1257:     {error, {faked_transport,connect,Timeout}}.
 1258: 
 1259: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1260: %%% Test fourth argument in ssh:connect/4
 1261: ssh_connect_arg4_timeout(_Config) ->
 1262:     Timeout = 1000,
 1263:     Parent = self(),
 1264:     %% start the server
 1265:     Server = spawn(fun() ->
 1266: 			   {ok,Sl} = gen_tcp:listen(0,[]),
 1267: 			   {ok,{_,Port}} = inet:sockname(Sl),
 1268: 			   Parent ! {port,self(),Port},
 1269: 			   Rsa = gen_tcp:accept(Sl),
 1270: 			   ct:log("Server gen_tcp:accept got ~p",[Rsa]),
 1271: 			   receive after 2*Timeout -> ok end %% let client timeout first
 1272: 		   end),
 1273: 
 1274:     %% Get listening port
 1275:     Port = receive
 1276: 	       {port,Server,ServerPort} -> ServerPort
 1277: 	   after 
 1278: 	       10000 -> ct:fail("timeout ~p:~p",[?MODULE,?LINE])
 1279: 	   end,
 1280: 
 1281:     %% try to connect with a timeout, but "supervise" it
 1282:     Client = spawn(fun() ->
 1283: 			   T0 = erlang:monotonic_time(),
 1284: 			   Rc = ssh:connect("localhost",Port,[{save_accepted_host, false}],Timeout),
 1285: 			   ct:log("Client ssh:connect got ~p",[Rc]),
 1286: 			   Parent ! {done,self(),Rc,T0}
 1287: 		   end),
 1288: 
 1289:     %% Wait for client reaction on the connection try:
 1290:     receive
 1291: 	{done, Client, {error,timeout}, T0} ->
 1292: 	    Msp = ms_passed(T0),
 1293: 	    exit(Server,hasta_la_vista___baby),
 1294: 	    Low = 0.9*Timeout,
 1295: 	    High =  4.0*Timeout,
 1296: 	    ct:log("Timeout limits: ~.4f - ~.4f ms, timeout "
 1297:                    "was ~.4f ms, expected ~p ms",[Low,High,Msp,Timeout]),
 1298: 	    if
 1299: 		Low<Msp, Msp<High -> ok;
 1300: 		true -> {fail, "timeout not within limits"}
 1301: 	    end;
 1302: 
 1303: 	{done, Client, {error,Other}, _T0} ->
 1304: 	    ct:log("Error message \"~p\" from the client is unexpected.",[{error,Other}]),
 1305: 	    {fail, "Unexpected error message"};
 1306: 
 1307: 	{done, Client, {ok,_Ref}, _T0} ->
 1308: 	    {fail,"ssh-connected ???"}
 1309:     after
 1310: 	5000 ->
 1311: 	    exit(Server,hasta_la_vista___baby),
 1312: 	    exit(Client,hasta_la_vista___baby),
 1313: 	    {fail, "Didn't timeout"}
 1314:     end.
 1315: 
 1316: %% Help function, elapsed milliseconds since T0
 1317: ms_passed(T0) ->
 1318:     %% OTP 18
 1319:     erlang:convert_time_unit(erlang:monotonic_time() - T0,
 1320: 			     native,
 1321: 			     micro_seconds) / 1000.
 1322: 
 1323: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1324: ssh_daemon_minimal_remote_max_packet_size_option(Config) ->
 1325:     SystemDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
 1326:     UserDir = proplists:get_value(user_dir, Config), 
 1327:     
 1328:     {Server, Host, Port} = ssh_test_lib:daemon([{system_dir, SystemDir},
 1329: 						{user_dir, UserDir},
 1330: 						{user_passwords, [{"vego", "morot"}]},
 1331: 						{failfun, fun ssh_test_lib:failfun/2},
 1332: 						{minimal_remote_max_packet_size, 14}]),
 1333:     Conn =
 1334: 	ssh_test_lib:connect(Host, Port, [{silently_accept_hosts, true},
 1335: 					  {user_dir, UserDir},
 1336: 					  {user_interaction, false},
 1337: 					  {user, "vego"},
 1338: 					  {password, "morot"}]),
 1339: 
 1340:     %% Try the limits of the minimal_remote_max_packet_size:
 1341:     {ok, _ChannelId} = ssh_connection:session_channel(Conn, 100, 14, infinity),
 1342:     {open_error,_,"Maximum packet size below 14 not supported",_} = 
 1343: 	ssh_connection:session_channel(Conn, 100, 13, infinity),
 1344: 
 1345:     ssh:close(Conn),
 1346:     ssh:stop_daemon(Server).
 1347:     
 1348: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1349: %% This test try every algorithm by connecting to an Erlang server
 1350: id_string_no_opt_client(Config) ->
 1351:     {Server, _Host, Port} = fake_daemon(Config),
 1352:     {error,_} = ssh:connect("localhost", Port, [{save_accepted_host, false}], 1000),
 1353:     receive
 1354: 	{id,Server,"SSH-2.0-Erlang/"++Vsn} ->
 1355: 	    true = expected_ssh_vsn(Vsn);
 1356: 	{id,Server,Other} ->
 1357: 	    ct:fail("Unexpected id: ~s.",[Other])
 1358:     after 5000 ->
 1359: 	    {fail,timeout}
 1360:     end.
 1361: 
 1362: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1363: id_string_own_string_client(Config) ->
 1364:     {Server, _Host, Port} = fake_daemon(Config),
 1365:     {error,_} = ssh:connect("localhost", Port, [{id_string,"Pelle"},
 1366:                                                 {save_accepted_host, false}
 1367:                                                ], 1000),
 1368:     receive
 1369: 	{id,Server,"SSH-2.0-Pelle\r\n"} ->
 1370: 	    ok;
 1371: 	{id,Server,Other} ->
 1372: 	    ct:fail("Unexpected id: ~s.",[Other])
 1373:     after 5000 ->
 1374: 	    {fail,timeout}
 1375:     end.
 1376: 
 1377: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1378: id_string_own_string_client_trail_space(Config) ->
 1379:     {Server, _Host, Port} = fake_daemon(Config),
 1380:     {error,_} = ssh:connect("localhost", Port, [{id_string,"Pelle "},
 1381:                                                 {save_accepted_host, false}], 1000),
 1382:     receive
 1383: 	{id,Server,"SSH-2.0-Pelle \r\n"} ->
 1384: 	    ok;
 1385: 	{id,Server,Other} ->
 1386: 	    ct:fail("Unexpected id: ~s.",[Other])
 1387:     after 5000 ->
 1388: 	    {fail,timeout}
 1389:     end.
 1390: 
 1391: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1392: id_string_random_client(Config) ->
 1393:     {Server, _Host, Port} = fake_daemon(Config),
 1394:     {error,_} = ssh:connect("localhost", Port, [{id_string,random},
 1395:                                                 {save_accepted_host, false}], 1000),
 1396:     receive
 1397: 	{id,Server,Id="SSH-2.0-Erlang"++_} ->
 1398: 	    ct:fail("Unexpected id: ~s.",[Id]);
 1399: 	{id,Server,Rnd="SSH-2.0-"++ID} when 4=<length(ID),length(ID)=<7 -> %% Add 2 for CRLF
 1400: 	    ct:log("Got correct ~s",[Rnd]);
 1401: 	{id,Server,Id} ->
 1402: 	    ct:fail("Unexpected id: ~s.",[Id])
 1403:     after 5000 ->
 1404: 	    {fail,timeout}
 1405:     end.
 1406: 
 1407: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1408: id_string_no_opt_server(Config) ->
 1409:     {_Server, Host, Port} = ssh_test_lib:std_daemon(Config, []),
 1410:     {ok,S1}=ssh_test_lib:gen_tcp_connect(Host,Port,[{active,false},{packet,line}]),
 1411:     {ok,"SSH-2.0-Erlang/"++Vsn} = gen_tcp:recv(S1, 0, 2000),
 1412:     true = expected_ssh_vsn(Vsn).
 1413: 
 1414: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1415: id_string_own_string_server(Config) ->
 1416:     {_Server, Host, Port} = ssh_test_lib:std_daemon(Config, [{id_string,"Olle"}]),
 1417:     {ok,S1}=ssh_test_lib:gen_tcp_connect(Host,Port,[{active,false},{packet,line}]),
 1418:     {ok,"SSH-2.0-Olle\r\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(S1, 0, 2000).
 1419: 
 1420: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1421: id_string_own_string_server_trail_space(Config) ->
 1422:     {_Server, Host, Port} = ssh_test_lib:std_daemon(Config, [{id_string,"Olle "}]),
 1423:     {ok,S1}=ssh_test_lib:gen_tcp_connect(Host,Port,[{active,false},{packet,line}]),
 1424:     {ok,"SSH-2.0-Olle \r\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(S1, 0, 2000).
 1425: 
 1426: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1427: id_string_random_server(Config) ->
 1428:     %% Check undocumented format of id_string. First a bad variant:
 1429:     {error,{eoptions,_}} = ssh:daemon(0, [{id_string,{random,8,6}}]),
 1430:     %% And then a correct one:
 1431:     {_Server, Host, Port} = ssh_test_lib:std_daemon(Config, [{id_string,{random,6,8}}]),
 1432:     {ok,S1}=ssh_test_lib:gen_tcp_connect(Host,Port,[{active,false},{packet,line}]),
 1433:     {ok,"SSH-2.0-"++Rnd} = gen_tcp:recv(S1, 0, 2000),
 1434:     case Rnd of
 1435: 	"Erlang"++_ -> ct:log("Id=~p",[Rnd]),
 1436: 		       {fail,got_default_id};
 1437: 	"Olle\r\n" -> {fail,got_previous_tests_value};
 1438: 	_ when 8=<length(Rnd),length(Rnd)=<10 -> %% Add 2 for CRLF
 1439: 	    ct:log("Got correct ~s",[Rnd]);
 1440: 	_ ->
 1441:             ct:log("Got wrong sized ~s.",[Rnd]),
 1442:             {fail,got_wrong_size}
 1443:     end.
 1444: 
 1445: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1446: ssh_connect_negtimeout_parallel(Config) -> ssh_connect_negtimeout(Config,true).
 1447: ssh_connect_negtimeout_sequential(Config) -> ssh_connect_negtimeout(Config,false).
 1448:     
 1449: ssh_connect_negtimeout(Config, Parallel) ->
 1450:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 1451:     SystemDir = filename:join(proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config), system),
 1452:     UserDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
 1453:     NegTimeOut = 2000,				% ms
 1454:     ct:log("Parallel: ~p",[Parallel]),
 1455: 
 1456:     {_Pid, Host, Port} = ssh_test_lib:daemon([{system_dir, SystemDir},{user_dir, UserDir},
 1457:                                                {parallel_login, Parallel},
 1458:                                                {negotiation_timeout, NegTimeOut},
 1459:                                                {failfun, fun ssh_test_lib:failfun/2}]),
 1460: 
 1461:     {ok,Socket} = ssh_test_lib:gen_tcp_connect(Host, Port, []),
 1462: 
 1463:     Factor = 2,
 1464:     ct:log("And now sleeping ~p*NegTimeOut (~p ms)...", [Factor, round(Factor * NegTimeOut)]),
 1465:     ct:sleep(round(Factor * NegTimeOut)),
 1466:     
 1467:     case inet:sockname(Socket) of
 1468: 	{ok,_} -> 
 1469: 	    %% Give it another chance...
 1470: 	    ct:log("Sleep more...",[]),
 1471: 	    ct:sleep(round(Factor * NegTimeOut)),
 1472: 	    case inet:sockname(Socket) of
 1473: 		{ok,_} -> ct:fail("Socket not closed");
 1474: 		{error,_} -> ok
 1475: 	    end;
 1476: 	{error,_} -> ok
 1477:     end.
 1478: 
 1479: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1480: %%% Test that ssh connection does not timeout if the connection is established (parallel)
 1481: ssh_connect_nonegtimeout_connected_parallel(Config) ->
 1482:     ssh_connect_nonegtimeout_connected(Config, true).
 1483: 
 1484: %%% Test that ssh connection does not timeout if the connection is established (non-parallel)
 1485: ssh_connect_nonegtimeout_connected_sequential(Config) ->
 1486:     ssh_connect_nonegtimeout_connected(Config, false).
 1487: 
 1488: 
 1489: ssh_connect_nonegtimeout_connected(Config, Parallel) ->
 1490:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 1491:     SystemDir = filename:join(proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config), system),
 1492:     UserDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
 1493:     NegTimeOut = 2000,				% ms
 1494:     ct:log("Parallel: ~p",[Parallel]),
 1495:    
 1496:     {_Pid, _Host, Port} = ssh_test_lib:daemon([{system_dir, SystemDir},{user_dir, UserDir},
 1497: 					       {parallel_login, Parallel},
 1498: 					       {negotiation_timeout, NegTimeOut},
 1499: 					       {failfun, fun ssh_test_lib:failfun/2}]),
 1500:     ct:log("~p Listen ~p:~p",[_Pid,_Host,Port]),
 1501:     ct:sleep(500),
 1502: 
 1503:     IO = ssh_test_lib:start_io_server(),
 1504:     Shell = ssh_test_lib:start_shell(Port, IO, [{user_dir,UserDir}]),
 1505:     receive
 1506: 	Error = {'EXIT', _, _} ->
 1507: 	    ct:log("~p",[Error]),
 1508: 	    ct:fail(no_ssh_connection);  
 1509: 	ErlShellStart ->
 1510: 	    ct:log("---Erlang shell start: ~p~n", [ErlShellStart]),
 1511: 	    one_shell_op(IO, NegTimeOut),
 1512: 	    one_shell_op(IO, NegTimeOut),
 1513: 
 1514: 	    Factor = 2,
 1515: 	    ct:log("And now sleeping ~p*NegTimeOut (~p ms)...", [Factor, round(Factor * NegTimeOut)]),
 1516: 	    ct:sleep(round(Factor * NegTimeOut)),
 1517:     
 1518: 	    one_shell_op(IO, NegTimeOut)
 1519:     after 
 1520: 	10000 -> ct:fail("timeout ~p:~p",[?MODULE,?LINE])
 1521:     end,
 1522:     exit(Shell, kill).
 1523: 
 1524: 
 1525: one_shell_op(IO, TimeOut) ->
 1526:     ct:log("One shell op: Waiting for prompter"),
 1527:     receive
 1528: 	ErlPrompt0 -> ct:log("Erlang prompt: ~p~n", [ErlPrompt0])
 1529:     after TimeOut -> ct:fail("Timeout waiting for promter")
 1530:     end,
 1531: 
 1532:     IO ! {input, self(), "2*3*7.\r\n"},
 1533:     receive
 1534: 	Result0 -> ct:log("Result: ~p~n", [Result0])
 1535:     after TimeOut ->  ct:fail("Timeout waiting for result")
 1536:     end.
 1537: 
 1538: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1539: max_log_item_len(Config) ->
 1540:     %% Find a supported algorithm (to be removed from the daemon):
 1541:     {ok, {Type,Alg}} = select_alg( ssh:default_algorithms() ),
 1542: 
 1543:     %% Start a test daemon without support for {Type,Alg}
 1544:     SystemDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
 1545:     UserDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
 1546:     {_Pid, Host0, Port} =
 1547:         ssh_test_lib:daemon([
 1548:                              {system_dir, SystemDir},
 1549:                              {user_dir, UserDir},
 1550:                              {user_passwords, [{"carni", "meat"}]},
 1551:                              {modify_algorithms, [{rm, [{Type,[Alg]}]}]},
 1552:                              {max_log_item_len, 10}
 1553:                             ]),
 1554:     Host = ssh_test_lib:mangle_connect_address(Host0),
 1555:     ct:log("~p:~p Listen ~p:~p. Mangled Host = ~p",
 1556:            [?MODULE,?LINE,Host0,Port,Host]),
 1557: 
 1558:     {ok,ReportHandlerPid} = ssh_eqc_event_handler:add_report_handler(),
 1559: 
 1560:     %% Connect to it with the {Type,Alg} to force a failure and log entry:
 1561:     {error,_} = R =
 1562:         ssh:connect(Host, Port, 
 1563:                     [{preferred_algorithms, [{Type,[Alg]}]},
 1564:                      {max_log_item_len, 10},
 1565:                      {silently_accept_hosts, true},
 1566:                      {save_accepted_host, false},
 1567:                      {user_dir, UserDir},
 1568:                      {user_interaction, false},
 1569:                      {user, "carni"},
 1570:                      {password, "meat"}
 1571:                     ]),
 1572: 
 1573:     {ok, Reports} = ssh_eqc_event_handler:get_reports(ReportHandlerPid),
 1574:     ct:log("~p:~p ssh:connect -> ~p~n~p", [?MODULE,?LINE,R,Reports]),
 1575: 
 1576:     [ok] =
 1577:         lists:usort(
 1578:           [check_skip_part(
 1579:              string:tokens(
 1580:                lists:flatten(io_lib:format(Fmt,Args)),
 1581:                " \n"))
 1582:            || {info_msg,_,{_,Fmt,Args}} <- Reports]
 1583:           ).
 1584: 
 1585: 
 1586: check_skip_part(["Disconnect","...","("++_NumSkipped, "bytes","skipped)"]) ->
 1587:     ok;
 1588: check_skip_part([_|T]) ->
 1589:     check_skip_part(T);
 1590: check_skip_part([]) ->
 1591:     error.
 1592: 
 1593: select_alg([{Type,[A,_|_]}|_]) when is_atom(A) -> {ok, {Type,A}};
 1594: select_alg([{Type,[{Dir,[A,_|_]}, _]}|_]) when is_atom(A), is_atom(Dir) -> {ok, {Type,A}};
 1595: select_alg([{Type,[_,{Dir,[A,_|_]}]}|_]) when is_atom(A), is_atom(Dir) -> {ok, {Type,A}};
 1596: select_alg([_|Algs]) -> select_alg(Algs);
 1597: select_alg([]) -> false.
 1598: 
 1599: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1600: max_sessions_ssh_connect_parallel(Config) -> 
 1601:     max_sessions(Config, true, connect_fun(ssh__connect,Config)).
 1602: max_sessions_ssh_connect_sequential(Config) -> 
 1603:     max_sessions(Config, false, connect_fun(ssh__connect,Config)).
 1604: 
 1605: max_sessions_sftp_start_channel_parallel(Config) -> 
 1606:     max_sessions(Config, true, connect_fun(ssh_sftp__start_channel, Config)).
 1607: max_sessions_sftp_start_channel_sequential(Config) -> 
 1608:     max_sessions(Config, false, connect_fun(ssh_sftp__start_channel, Config)).
 1609: 
 1610: 
 1611: %%%---- helpers:
 1612: connect_fun(ssh__connect, Config) ->
 1613:     fun(Host,Port) ->
 1614: 	    ssh_test_lib:connect(Host, Port, 
 1615: 				 [{silently_accept_hosts, true},
 1616: 				  {user_dir, proplists:get_value(priv_dir,Config)},
 1617: 				  {user_interaction, false},
 1618: 				  {user, "carni"},
 1619: 				  {password, "meat"}
 1620: 				 ])
 1621: 	    %% ssh_test_lib returns R when ssh:connect returns {ok,R}
 1622:     end;
 1623: connect_fun(ssh_sftp__start_channel, _Config) ->
 1624:     fun(Host,Port) ->
 1625: 	    {ok,_Pid,ConnRef} =
 1626: 		ssh_sftp:start_channel(Host, Port, 
 1627: 				       [{silently_accept_hosts, true},
 1628:                                         {save_accepted_host, false},
 1629: 					{user, "carni"},
 1630: 					{password, "meat"}
 1631: 				       ]),
 1632: 	    ConnRef
 1633:     end.
 1634: 
 1635: 
 1636: max_sessions(Config, ParallelLogin, Connect0) when is_function(Connect0,2) ->
 1637:     Connect = fun(Host,Port) ->
 1638: 		      R = Connect0(Host,Port),
 1639: 		      ct:log("Connect(~p,~p) -> ~p",[Host,Port,R]),
 1640: 		      R
 1641: 	      end,
 1642:     SystemDir = filename:join(proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config), system),
 1643:     UserDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
 1644:     MaxSessions = 5,
 1645:     {Pid, Host, Port} = ssh_test_lib:daemon([
 1646: 					     {system_dir, SystemDir},
 1647: 					     {user_dir, UserDir},
 1648: 					     {user_passwords, [{"carni", "meat"}]},
 1649: 					     {parallel_login, ParallelLogin},
 1650: 					     {max_sessions, MaxSessions}
 1651: 					    ]),
 1652:     ct:log("~p Listen ~p:~p for max ~p sessions",[Pid,Host,Port,MaxSessions]),
 1653:     try [Connect(Host,Port) || _ <- lists:seq(1,MaxSessions)]
 1654:     of
 1655: 	Connections ->
 1656: 	    %% Step 1 ok: could set up max_sessions connections
 1657: 	    ct:log("Connections up: ~p",[Connections]),
 1658: 	    [_|_] = Connections,
 1659: 
 1660: 	    %% N w try one more than allowed:
 1661: 	    ct:log("Info Report expected here (if not disabled) ...",[]),
 1662: 	    try Connect(Host,Port)
 1663: 	    of
 1664: 		_ConnectionRef1 ->
 1665: 		    ssh:stop_daemon(Pid),
 1666: 		    {fail,"Too many connections accepted"}
 1667: 	    catch
 1668: 		error:{badmatch,{error,"Connection closed"}} ->
 1669:                     ct:log("Step 2 ok: could not set up too many connections. Good.",[]),
 1670: 		    %% Now stop one connection and try to open one more
 1671: 		    ok = ssh:close(hd(Connections)),
 1672: 		    try_to_connect(Connect, Host, Port, Pid)
 1673: 	    end
 1674:     catch
 1675: 	error:{badmatch,{error,"Connection closed"}} ->
 1676: 	    ssh:stop_daemon(Pid),
 1677: 	    {fail,"Too few connections accepted"}
 1678:     end.
 1679: 
 1680: 
 1681: try_to_connect(Connect, Host, Port, Pid) ->
 1682:     {ok,Tref} = timer:send_after(30000, timeout_no_connection), % give the supervisors some time...
 1683:     try_to_connect(Connect, Host, Port, Pid, Tref, 1). % will take max 3300 ms after 11 tries
 1684: 
 1685: try_to_connect(Connect, Host, Port, Pid, Tref, N) ->
 1686:      try Connect(Host,Port)
 1687:      of
 1688: 	 _ConnectionRef1 ->
 1689: 	     timer:cancel(Tref),
 1690:              ct:log("Step 3 ok: could set up one more connection after killing one. That's good.",[]),
 1691: 	     ssh:stop_daemon(Pid),
 1692: 	     receive % flush. 
 1693: 		 timeout_no_connection -> ok
 1694: 	     after 0 -> ok
 1695: 	     end
 1696:      catch
 1697: 	 error:{badmatch,{error,"Connection closed"}} ->
 1698: 	     %% Could not set up one more connection. Try again until timeout.
 1699: 	     receive
 1700: 		 timeout_no_connection ->
 1701: 		     ssh:stop_daemon(Pid),
 1702: 		     {fail,"Does not decrease # active sessions"}
 1703: 	     after N*50 -> % retry after this time
 1704: 		     try_to_connect(Connect, Host, Port, Pid, Tref, N+1)
 1705: 	     end
 1706:      end.
 1707: 
 1708: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1709: max_sessions_drops_tcp_connects() ->
 1710:     [{timetrap,{minutes,2}}].
 1711: 
 1712: max_sessions_drops_tcp_connects(Config) ->
 1713:     MaxSessions = 20,
 1714:     UseSessions = 2, % Must be =< MaxSessions
 1715:     FloodSessions = 1000,
 1716:     ParallelLogin = true,
 1717:     NegTimeOut = 8*1000,
 1718:     HelloTimeOut = 200,
 1719: 
 1720:     %% Start a test daemon
 1721:     SystemDir = filename:join(proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config), system),
 1722:     UserDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
 1723:     {Pid, Host0, Port} =
 1724:         ssh_test_lib:daemon([
 1725:                              {system_dir, SystemDir},
 1726:                              {user_dir, UserDir},
 1727:                              {user_passwords, [{"carni", "meat"}]},
 1728:                              {parallel_login, ParallelLogin},
 1729:                              {hello_timeout, HelloTimeOut},
 1730:                              {negotiation_timeout, NegTimeOut},
 1731:                              {max_sessions, MaxSessions}
 1732:                             ]),
 1733:     Host = ssh_test_lib:mangle_connect_address(Host0),
 1734:     ct:log("~p:~p ~p Listen ~p:~p for max ~p sessions. Mangled Host = ~p",
 1735:            [?MODULE,?LINE,Pid,Host0,Port,MaxSessions,Host]),
 1736:     
 1737:     %% Log in UseSessions connections
 1738:     SSHconnect = fun(N) ->
 1739:                          R = ssh:connect(Host, Port, 
 1740:                                          [{silently_accept_hosts, true},
 1741:                                           {save_accepted_host, false},
 1742:                                           {user_dir, proplists:get_value(priv_dir,Config)},
 1743:                                           {user_interaction, false},
 1744:                                           {user, "carni"},
 1745:                                           {password, "meat"}
 1746:                                          ]),
 1747:                          ct:log("~p:~p ~p: ssh:connect -> ~p", [?MODULE,?LINE,N,R]),
 1748:                          R
 1749:                  end,
 1750: 
 1751:     L1 = oks([SSHconnect(N) || N <- lists:seq(1,UseSessions)]),
 1752:     case length(L1) of
 1753:         UseSessions ->
 1754:             %% As expected
 1755:             %% Try gen_tcp:connect
 1756:             [ct:log("~p:~p ~p: gen_tcp:connect -> ~p", 
 1757:                     [?MODULE,?LINE, N, gen_tcp:connect(Host, Port, [])])
 1758:              || N <- lists:seq(UseSessions+1, MaxSessions)
 1759:             ],
 1760: 
 1761:             ct:log("~p:~p Now try ~p gen_tcp:connect to be rejected", [?MODULE,?LINE,FloodSessions]),
 1762:             [ct:log("~p:~p ~p: gen_tcp:connect -> ~p", 
 1763:                     [?MODULE,?LINE, N, gen_tcp:connect(Host, Port, [])])
 1764:              || N <- lists:seq(MaxSessions+1, MaxSessions+1+FloodSessions)
 1765:             ],
 1766:             
 1767:             ct:log("~p:~p try ~p ssh:connect", [?MODULE,?LINE, MaxSessions - UseSessions]),
 1768:             try_ssh_connect(MaxSessions - UseSessions, NegTimeOut, SSHconnect);
 1769: 
 1770:         Len1 ->
 1771:             {fail, Len1}
 1772:     end.
 1773: 
 1774: try_ssh_connect(N, NegTimeOut, F) when N>0 ->
 1775:     case F(N) of
 1776:         {ok,_} ->
 1777:             try_ssh_connect(N-1, NegTimeOut, F);
 1778:         {error,_} when N==1 ->
 1779:             try_ssh_connect(N, NegTimeOut, F);
 1780:         {error,_} ->
 1781:             timer:sleep(NegTimeOut),
 1782:             try_ssh_connect(N, NegTimeOut, F)
 1783:     end;
 1784: try_ssh_connect(_N, _NegTimeOut, _F) ->
 1785:     done.
 1786: 
 1787: 
 1788: oks(L) -> lists:filter(fun({ok,_}) -> true;
 1789:                           (_) -> false
 1790:                        end, L).
 1791:     
 1792: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1793: save_accepted_host_option(Config) ->
 1794:     UserDir = proplists:get_value(user_dir, Config),
 1795:     KnownHosts = filename:join(UserDir, "known_hosts"),
 1796:     SysDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),	  
 1797:     {Pid, Host, Port} = ssh_test_lib:daemon([{system_dir, SysDir},
 1798: 					     {user_dir, UserDir},
 1799: 					     {user_passwords, [{"vego", "morot"}]}
 1800:                                             ]),
 1801:     {error,enoent} = file:read_file(KnownHosts),
 1802: 
 1803:     {ok,_C1} = ssh:connect(Host, Port, [{silently_accept_hosts, true},
 1804:                                         {save_accepted_host, false},
 1805:                                         {user, "vego"},
 1806:                                         {password, "morot"},
 1807:                                         {user_interaction, false},
 1808:                                         {user_dir, UserDir}]),
 1809:     {error,enoent} = file:read_file(KnownHosts),
 1810:     
 1811:     {ok,_C2} = ssh:connect(Host, Port, [{silently_accept_hosts, true},
 1812:                                         {user, "vego"},
 1813:                                         {password, "morot"},
 1814:                                         {user_interaction, false},
 1815:                                         {user_dir, UserDir}]),
 1816:     {ok,_} = file:read_file(KnownHosts),
 1817:     ssh:stop_daemon(Pid).
 1818: 
 1819: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1820: raw_option(_Config) ->
 1821:     Opts = [{raw,1,2,3,4}],
 1822:     #{socket_options := Opts} = ssh_options:handle_options(client, Opts),
 1823:     #{socket_options := Opts} = ssh_options:handle_options(server, Opts).
 1824: 
 1825: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1826: config_file(Config) ->
 1827:     %% First find common algs:
 1828:     ServerAlgs = ssh_test_lib:default_algorithms(sshd),
 1829:     OurAlgs = ssh_transport:supported_algorithms(), % Incl disabled but supported
 1830:     CommonAlgs = ssh_test_lib:intersection(ServerAlgs, OurAlgs),
 1831:     ct:log("ServerAlgs =~n~p~n~nOurAlgs =~n~p~n~nCommonAlgs =~n~p",[ServerAlgs,OurAlgs,CommonAlgs]),   
 1832:     Nkex = length(proplists:get_value(kex, CommonAlgs, [])),
 1833: 
 1834:     %% Adjust for very old ssh daemons that only supports ssh-rsa and ssh-dss:
 1835:     AdjustClient =
 1836:         case proplists:get_value(public_key,ServerAlgs,[]) -- ['ssh-rsa','ssh-dss'] of
 1837:             [] ->
 1838:                 %% Old, let the client support them also:
 1839:                 ct:log("Adjust the client's public_key set", []),
 1840:                 [{public_key, ['ssh-rsa','ssh-dss']}];
 1841:             [_|_] ->
 1842:                 %% Ok, let the client be un-modified:
 1843:                 []
 1844:         end,
 1845: 
 1846:     case {ServerAlgs, ssh_test_lib:some_empty(CommonAlgs)} of
 1847:         {[],_} ->
 1848:             {skip, "No server algorithms found"};
 1849:         {_,true} ->
 1850:             {fail, "Missing common algorithms"};
 1851:         _ when Nkex<3 ->
