 1852:             {skip, "Not enough number of common kex"};
 1853:         _ ->
 1854:             %% Then find three common kex and one common cipher:
 1855:             [K1a,K1b,K2a|_] = proplists:get_value(kex, CommonAlgs),
 1856:             [{_,[Ch1|_]}|_] = proplists:get_value(cipher, CommonAlgs),
 1857: 
 1858:             %% Make config file:
 1859:             {ok,ConfFile} = 
 1860:                 make_config_file_in_privdir(
 1861:                   "c2.config", Config,
 1862:                   [{ssh, [{preferred_algorithms,
 1863:                            [{cipher, [Ch1]},
 1864:                             {kex,    [K1a]}
 1865:                            ] ++ AdjustClient},
 1866:                           {client_options,
 1867:                            [{modify_algorithms,
 1868:                              [{rm,     [{kex, [K1a]}]},
 1869:                               {append, [{kex, [K1b]}]}
 1870:                              ]}
 1871:                            ]}
 1872:                          ]}
 1873:                   ]),
 1874: 
 1875:             %% Start the slave node with the configuration just made:
 1876:             {ok, Peer, Node} = ?CT_PEER(["-config", ConfFile]),
 1877: 
 1878:             R0 = rpc:call(Node, ssh, default_algorithms, []),
 1879:             ct:log("R0 = ~p",[R0]),
 1880:             R0 = ssh:default_algorithms(),
 1881: 
 1882:             %% Start ssh on the slave. This should apply the ConfFile:
 1883:             rpc:call(Node, ssh, start, []),
 1884: 
 1885:             R1 = rpc:call(Node, ssh, default_algorithms, []),
 1886:             ct:log("R1 = ~p",[R1]),
 1887:             [{kex,[K1a]},
 1888:              {public_key,_},
 1889:              {cipher,[{_,[Ch1]},
 1890:                       {_,[Ch1]}]} | _] = R1,
 1891: 
 1892:             %% First connection. The client_options should be applied:
 1893:             {ok,C1} = rpc:call(Node, ssh, connect, [loopback, ?SSH_DEFAULT_PORT,
 1894:                                                     [{silently_accept_hosts, true},
 1895:                                                      {save_accepted_host, false},
 1896:                                                      {user_interaction, false}
 1897:                                                     ]]),
 1898:             ct:log("C1 = ~n~p", [C1]),
 1899:             {algorithms,As1} = rpc:call(Node, ssh, connection_info, [C1, algorithms]),
 1900:             K1b = proplists:get_value(kex, As1),
 1901:             Ch1 = proplists:get_value(encrypt, As1),
 1902:             Ch1 = proplists:get_value(decrypt, As1),
 1903:             {options,Os1} = rpc:call(Node, ssh, connection_info, [C1, options]),
 1904:             ct:log("C1 algorithms:~n~p~n~noptions:~n~p", [As1,Os1]),
 1905: 
 1906:             %% Second connection, the Options take precedence:
 1907:             C2_Opts = [{modify_algorithms,[{rm,[{kex,[K1b]}]}, % N.B.
 1908:                                            {append, [{kex,[K2a]}]}]},
 1909:                        {silently_accept_hosts, true},
 1910:                        {save_accepted_host, false},
 1911:                        {user_interaction, false}
 1912:                       ],
 1913:             {ok,C2} = rpc:call(Node, ssh, connect, [loopback, ?SSH_DEFAULT_PORT, C2_Opts]),
 1914:             {algorithms,As2} = rpc:call(Node, ssh, connection_info, [C2, algorithms]),
 1915:             K2a = proplists:get_value(kex, As2),
 1916:             Ch1 = proplists:get_value(encrypt, As2),
 1917:             Ch1 = proplists:get_value(decrypt, As2),
 1918:             {options,Os2} = rpc:call(Node, ssh, connection_info, [C2, options]),
 1919:             ct:log("C2 opts:~n~p~n~nalgorithms:~n~p~n~noptions:~n~p", [C2_Opts,As2,Os2]),
 1920: 
 1921:             peer:stop(Peer)
 1922:     end.
 1923:     
 1924: %%%----------------------------------------------------------------
 1925: config_file_modify_algorithms_order(Config) ->
 1926:     %% First find common algs:
 1927:     ServerAlgs = ssh_test_lib:default_algorithms(sshd),
 1928:     OurAlgs = ssh_transport:supported_algorithms(), % Incl disabled but supported
 1929:     CommonAlgs = ssh_test_lib:intersection(ServerAlgs, OurAlgs),
 1930:     ct:log("ServerAlgs =~n~p~n~nOurAlgs =~n~p~n~nCommonAlgs =~n~p",[ServerAlgs,OurAlgs,CommonAlgs]),
 1931:     Nkex = length(proplists:get_value(kex, CommonAlgs, [])),
 1932:     case {ServerAlgs, ssh_test_lib:some_empty(CommonAlgs)} of
 1933:         {[],_} ->
 1934:             {skip, "No server algorithms found"};
 1935:         {_,true} ->
 1936:             {fail, "Missing common algorithms"};
 1937:         _ when Nkex<3 ->
 1938:             {skip, "Not enough number of common kex"};
 1939:         _ ->
 1940:             %% Then find three common kex and one common cipher:
 1941:             [K1,K2,K3|_] = proplists:get_value(kex, CommonAlgs),
 1942:             [{_,[Ch1|_]}|_] = proplists:get_value(cipher, CommonAlgs),
 1943: 
 1944:             %% Make config file:
 1945:             {ok, ConfFile} =
 1946:                 make_config_file_in_privdir(
 1947:                   "c3.config", Config,
 1948:                   [{ssh, [{preferred_algorithms,
 1949:                            [{cipher, [Ch1]},
 1950:                             {kex,    [K1]}
 1951:                            ]},
 1952:                           {server_options,
 1953:                            [{modify_algorithms,
 1954:                              [{rm,     [{kex, [K1]}]},
 1955:                               {append, [{kex, [K2]}]}
 1956:                              ]}
 1957:                            ]},
 1958:                           {client_options,
 1959:                            [{modify_algorithms,
 1960:                              [{rm,     [{kex, [K1]}]},
 1961:                               {append, [{kex, [K3]}]}
 1962:                              ]}
 1963:                            ]}
 1964:                          ]}
 1965:                   ]),
 1966: 
 1967:             %% Start the slave node with the configuration just made:
 1968:             {ok, Peer, Node} = ?CT_PEER(["-config", ConfFile]),
 1969:     
 1970:             R0 = rpc:call(Node, ssh, default_algorithms, []),
 1971:             ct:log("R0 = ~p",[R0]),
 1972:             R0 = ssh:default_algorithms(),
 1973: 
 1974:             %% Start ssh on the slave. This should apply the ConfFile:
 1975:             ok = rpc:call(Node, ssh, start, []),
 1976:             R1 = rpc:call(Node, ssh, default_algorithms, []),
 1977:             ct:log("R1 = ~p",[R1]),
 1978:             [{kex,[K1]} | _] = R1,
 1979: 
 1980:             %% Start a daemon
 1981:             {Server, Host, Port} = rpc:call(Node, ssh_test_lib, std_daemon, [Config, []]),
 1982:             {ok,ServerInfo} = rpc:call(Node, ssh, daemon_info, [Server]),
 1983:             ct:log("ServerInfo =~n~p", [ServerInfo]),
 1984: 
 1985:             %% Test that the server_options env key works:
 1986:             [K2] = proplists:get_value(kex,
 1987:                    proplists:get_value(preferred_algorithms,
 1988:                    proplists:get_value(options, ServerInfo))),
 1989:             
 1990:             {badrpc, {'EXIT', {{badmatch,ExpectedError}, _}}} =
 1991:                 %% No common kex algorithms expected. 
 1992:                 rpc:call(Node, ssh_test_lib, std_connect, [Config, Host, Port, []]), 
 1993:             {error,"Key exchange failed"} = ExpectedError,
 1994: 
 1995:             C = rpc:call(Node, ssh_test_lib, std_connect,
 1996:                          [Config, Host, Port, 
 1997:                           [{modify_algorithms,[{append,[{kex,[K2]}]}]}]]),
 1998:             ConnInfo = rpc:call(Node, ssh, connection_info, [C]),
 1999:             ct:log("ConnInfo =~n~p", [ConnInfo]),
 2000:             Algs = proplists:get_value(algorithms, ConnInfo),
 2001:             ct:log("Algs =~n~p", [Algs]),
 2002:             ConnOptions = proplists:get_value(options, ConnInfo),
 2003:             ConnPrefAlgs = proplists:get_value(preferred_algorithms, ConnOptions),
 2004: 
 2005:             %% And now, are all levels applied in right order:
 2006:             [K3,K2] = proplists:get_value(kex, ConnPrefAlgs),
 2007: 
 2008:             peer:stop(Peer)
 2009:     end.
 2010: 
 2011:     
 2012: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 2013: daemon_replace_options_simple(Config) ->
 2014:     SysDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
 2015: 
 2016:     UserDir1 = proplists:get_value(user_dir, Config),
 2017:     UserDir2 = filename:join(UserDir1, "foo"),
 2018:     file:make_dir(UserDir2),
 2019: 
 2020:     {Pid, _Host, _Port} = ssh_test_lib:daemon([{system_dir, SysDir},
 2021:                                                {user_dir, UserDir1}
 2022:                                               ]),
 2023:     {ok,Opts1} = ssh:daemon_info(Pid),
 2024:     UserDir1 = proplists:get_value(user_dir, proplists:get_value(options,Opts1,[])),
 2025: 
 2026:     {ok, Pid} = ssh:daemon_replace_options(Pid, [{user_dir,UserDir2}]),
 2027:     {ok,Opts2} = ssh:daemon_info(Pid),
 2028:     case proplists:get_value(user_dir, proplists:get_value(options,Opts2,[])) of
 2029:         UserDir2 ->
 2030:             ok;
 2031:         UserDir1 ->
 2032:             ct:log("~p:~p Got old value ~p~nExpected ~p", [?MODULE,?LINE,UserDir1,UserDir2]),
 2033:             {fail, "Not changed"};
 2034:         Other ->
 2035:             ct:log("~p:~p Got ~p~nExpected ~p", [?MODULE,?LINE,Other,UserDir2]),
 2036:             {fail, "Strange value"}
 2037:     end.
 2038: 
 2039: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 2040: daemon_replace_options_algs(Config) ->
 2041:     SysDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
 2042:     UserDir = proplists:get_value(user_dir, Config),
 2043: 
 2044:     DefaultKex =
 2045:         ssh_transport:default_algorithms(kex),
 2046:     NonDefaultKex =
 2047:         ssh_transport:supported_algorithms(kex) -- DefaultKex,
 2048: 
 2049:     case NonDefaultKex of
 2050:         [A1|_] ->
 2051:             [A2,A3|_] = DefaultKex,
 2052:             {Pid, _Host, _Port} = ssh_test_lib:daemon([{system_dir, SysDir},
 2053:                                                        {user_dir, UserDir},
 2054:                                                        {preferred_algorithms,[{kex,[A1]}]}
 2055:                                                       ]),
 2056:             [A1] = get_preferred_algorithms(Pid, kex),
 2057:             {ok, Pid} =
 2058:                 ssh:daemon_replace_options(Pid, [{modify_algorithms,
 2059:                                                   [{prepend,[{kex,[A2]}]}]
 2060:                                                  }
 2061:                                                 ]),
 2062:             [A2,A1] = get_preferred_algorithms(Pid, kex),
 2063: 
 2064:             {ok, Pid} =
 2065:                 ssh:daemon_replace_options(Pid, [{preferred_algorithms,[{kex,[A3]}]
 2066:                                                  }
 2067:                                                 ]),
 2068:             [A2,A3] = get_preferred_algorithms(Pid, kex)
 2069:             ;
 2070:         [] ->
 2071:             {skip, "No non-default kex"}
 2072:     end.
 2073: 
 2074: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 2075: daemon_replace_options_algs_connect(Config) ->
 2076:     [A1,A2|_] =
 2077:         ssh_transport:default_algorithms(kex),
 2078: 
 2079:     {Pid, Host, Port} =
 2080:         ssh_test_lib:std_daemon(Config,
 2081:                                 [{preferred_algorithms,[{kex,[A1]}]}
 2082:                                 ]),
 2083:     [A1] = get_preferred_algorithms(Pid, kex),
 2084: 
 2085:     %% Open a connection with A1 as kex and test it
 2086:     C1 =
 2087:         ssh_test_lib:std_connect(Config, Host, Port,
 2088:                                  [{preferred_algorithms,[{kex,[A1]}]}
 2089:                                  ]),
 2090:     ok = test_connection(C1),
 2091:     ok = test_not_connect(Config, Host, Port,
 2092:                           [{preferred_algorithms,[{kex,[A2]}]}
 2093:                           ]),
 2094: 
 2095:     %% Change kex to A2
 2096:     {ok, Pid} =
 2097:         ssh:daemon_replace_options(Pid,
 2098:                                    [{preferred_algorithms,[{kex,[A2]}]}]),
 2099:     [A2] = get_preferred_algorithms(Pid, kex),
 2100: 
 2101:     %% and open the second connection with this kex, and test it
 2102:     C2 =
 2103:         ssh_test_lib:std_connect(Config, Host, Port,
 2104:                                  [{preferred_algorithms,[{kex,[A2]}]}
 2105:                                  ]),
 2106:     ok = test_connection(C2),
 2107:     ok = test_not_connect(Config, Host, Port,
 2108:                           [{preferred_algorithms,[{kex,[A1]}]}
 2109:                           ]),
 2110: 
 2111:     %% Test that the first connection is still alive:
 2112:     ok = test_connection(C1),
 2113: 
 2114:     ssh:close(C1),
 2115:     ssh:close(C2),
 2116:     ssh:stop_daemon(Pid).
 2117: 
 2118: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 2119: daemon_replace_options_algs_conf_file(Config) ->
 2120:     SysDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
 2121:     UserDir = proplists:get_value(user_dir, Config),
 2122: 
 2123:     DefaultKex =
 2124:         ssh_transport:default_algorithms(kex),
 2125:     NonDefaultKex =
 2126:         ssh_transport:supported_algorithms(kex) -- DefaultKex,
 2127: 
 2128:     case NonDefaultKex of
 2129:         [A0,A1|_] ->
 2130:             %% Make config file:
 2131:             {ok,ConfFile} =
 2132:                 make_config_file_in_privdir(
 2133:                   "c4.config", Config,
 2134:                   [{ssh, [{modify_algorithms,
 2135:                            %% Whatever happens, always put A0 first in the kex list:
 2136:                            [{prepend, [{kex, [A0]}]}
 2137:                            ]}
 2138:                          ]}
 2139:                   ]),
 2140: 
 2141:             [A2|_] = DefaultKex,
 2142:             ct:log("[A0, A1, A2] = ~p", [[A0, A1, A2]]),
 2143: 
 2144:             %% Start the slave node with the configuration just made:
 2145:             {ok, Peer, Node} = ?CT_PEER(["-config", ConfFile]),
 2146: 
 2147:             %% Start ssh on the slave. This should apply the ConfFile:
 2148:             rpc:call(Node, ssh, start, []),
 2149: 
 2150:             {Pid, _Host, _Port} =
 2151:                 rpc:call(Node, ssh_test_lib, daemon,
 2152:                          [
 2153:                           [{system_dir, SysDir},
 2154:                            {user_dir, UserDir},
 2155:                            {preferred_algorithms,[{kex,[A1]}]}
 2156:                           ]
 2157:                          ]),
 2158: 
 2159:             [A0,A1] =
 2160:                 rpc:call(Node, ?MODULE, get_preferred_algorithms, [Pid, kex]),
 2161:             {ok, Pid} =
 2162:                 rpc:call(Node, ssh, daemon_replace_options,
 2163:                          [Pid,
 2164:                           [{modify_algorithms,
 2165:                             [{prepend,[{kex,[A2]}]}]
 2166:                            }
 2167:                           ]
 2168:                          ]),
 2169: 
 2170:             %% Check that the precedens order is fulfilled:
 2171:             [A2,A0,A1] =
 2172:                 rpc:call(Node, ?MODULE, get_preferred_algorithms, [Pid, kex]),
 2173: 
 2174:             peer:stop(Peer);
 2175:         [] ->
 2176:             {skip, "No non-default kex"}
 2177:     end.
 2178: 
 2179: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 2180: %% Internal functions ------------------------------------------------
 2181: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 2182: 
 2183: expected_ssh_vsn(Str) ->
 2184:     try
 2185: 	{ok,L} = application:get_all_key(ssh),
 2186: 	proplists:get_value(vsn,L,"")++"\r\n"
 2187:     of
 2188: 	Str -> true;
 2189: 	"\r\n" -> true;
 2190: 	_ -> false
 2191:     catch
 2192: 	_:_ -> true %% ssh not started so we don't know
 2193:     end.
 2194: 	    
 2195: 
 2196: fake_daemon(_Config) ->
 2197:     Parent = self(),
 2198:     %% start the server
 2199:     Server = spawn(fun() ->
 2200: 			   {ok,Sl} = gen_tcp:listen(0,[{packet,line}]),
 2201: 			   {ok,{Host,Port}} = inet:sockname(Sl),
 2202: 			   ct:log("fake_daemon listening on ~p:~p~n",[Host,Port]),
 2203: 			   Parent ! {sockname,self(),Host,Port},
 2204: 			   Rsa = gen_tcp:accept(Sl),
 2205: 			   ct:log("Server gen_tcp:accept got ~p",[Rsa]),
 2206: 			   {ok,S} = Rsa,
 2207: 			   receive
 2208: 			       {tcp, S, Id} -> Parent ! {id,self(),Id}
 2209: 			   after 
 2210: 			       10000 -> ct:fail("timeout ~p:~p",[?MODULE,?LINE])
 2211: 			   end
 2212: 		   end),
 2213:     %% Get listening host and port
 2214:     receive
 2215: 	{sockname,Server,ServerHost,ServerPort} -> {Server, ServerHost, ServerPort}
 2216:     after 
 2217: 	10000 -> ct:fail("timeout ~p:~p",[?MODULE,?LINE])
 2218:     end.
 2219: 
 2220: 
 2221: make_config_file_in_privdir(FileName, Config, Contents) ->
 2222:     %% write the file:
 2223:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
 2224:     ConfFile = filename:join(PrivDir, FileName),
 2225:     {ok,D} = file:open(ConfFile, [write]),
 2226:     io:format(D, "~p.~n", [Contents]),
 2227:     file:close(D),
 2228:     {ok,Cnfs} = file:read_file(ConfFile),
 2229:     ct:log("Config file ~p :~n~s", [ConfFile,Cnfs]),
 2230:     {ok,ConfFile}.
 2231: 
 2232: 
 2233: get_preferred_algorithms(Pid, Type) ->
 2234:     {ok,#{preferred_algorithms:=As}} = ssh_system_sup:get_acceptor_options(Pid),
 2235:     proplists:get_value(Type, As).
 2236: 
 2237: test_connection(C) ->
 2238:     {ok, Ch} = ssh_connection:session_channel(C, infinity),
 2239:     A = rand:uniform(100),
 2240:     B = rand:uniform(100),
 2241:     A_plus_B = lists:concat([A,"+",B,"."]),
 2242:     Sum = integer_to_binary(A+B),
 2243:     success = ssh_connection:exec(C, Ch, A_plus_B, infinity),
 2244:     expected = ssh_test_lib:receive_exec_result(
 2245:                  {ssh_cm, C, {data, Ch, 0, Sum}} ),
 2246:     ssh_test_lib:receive_exec_end(C, Ch),
 2247:     ok.
 2248: 
 2249: test_not_connect(Config, Host, Port, Opts) ->
 2250:     try
 2251:         ssh_test_lib:std_connect(Config, Host, Port, Opts)
 2252:     of
 2253:         Cx when is_pid(Cx) -> {error, connected}
 2254:     catch
 2255:         error:{badmatch, {error,_}} -> ok
 2256:     end.
 2257:
